[03]^b^Tato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0118^ea^ tato tato. ^b^Taṃ upanissāyā^eb^ti tā tā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo upanissāya. ^b^Adhivatthā^eb^ti ārāmavanarukkhādīsu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^Te^eb^ti te devā. ^b^Sandhāya kathetī^eb^ti bhagavā katheti. ^b^Vutta^eb^nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]Niccaṃ nibaddhaṃ uposatho saṃvacchare saṃvacchare paṭi paṭi haritabbato pavattetabbato ^b^pāṭihāriyapakkho nāma. Guṇaṅgehī^eb^ti uposathaṅgehi.

[03]^b^Vutthavāso^eb^ti vusitabrahmacariyavāso. ^b^Kattabbakicca^eb^nti dukkhādīsu pariññātādikiccaṃ. ^b^Otāretvā^eb^ti chaḍḍetvā. ^b^Parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano^eb^ti sabbaso khīṇabhavabandhano. ^b^Kāraṇena jānitvā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya cattāri ariyasaccāni jānitvā.

[03]^b^Jānanto^eb^ti ‘‘arahantānaṃ anukaraṇappaṭipatti esā, yadidaṃ sammadeva uposathānuṭṭhāna’’nti evaṃ uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānanto. ^b^Evarūpenā^eb^ti yādiso bhagavato uposathabhāvo vihito, evarūpena ^a^V2.0109^ea^ arahantānukaraṇena uposathakammena. ^b^Sakkā^eb^ pahitatto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā khīṇāsavasampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva^eb^ sattame vuttanayattā.
[06]Catumahārājasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^niddukkho^eb^ti kāyikacetasikadukkhavirahito. Sadukkhe hi savighāte sukhumālattā anavasarā, tasmā sukhito niddukkhatāya sukhumālo nāma. Yāvassa sukhumālattā paramukkaṃsagatāti āha ^b^‘‘paramasukhumālo’’^eb^ti. Ativiya sukhumāloti attho. Antamatītaṃ ^b^accantaṃ^eb^. Sabbadā sukhumāloti āha ^b^‘‘satataniddukkho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cariyakāle^eb^ti bodhicariyāya caraṇakāle. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti bodhisattena. Aññattha pana ^b^paduma^eb^nti rattaṃ kamalaṃ. ^b^Puṇḍarīka^eb^nti setaṃ vuccati. ^b^Itarā^eb^ti itarapokkharaṇiyo. ^b^‘‘Bodhisattassa kirā’’^eb^tiādikaṃ pokkharaṇīnaṃ ^a^M2.0119^ea^ uppattidassanaṃ. ^b^Kuddālakammakāre^eb^ti khaṇake. ^b^Pokkharaṇiṭṭhānānī^eb^ti pokkharaṇikhaṇanayoggaṭṭhānāni. ^b^Gaṇhāpesī^eb^ti khaṇāpesi. Pokkharaṇisaddo cettha tādise jalāsaye niruḷho daṭṭhabbo paṅkajādisaddā viya. Sopānabāhukānaṃ matthakaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^uṇhīsa^eb^nti adhippetaṃ. ^b^Udakasecananāḷikā^eb^ti udakacchaṭāvissajjananāḷiyantāni. ^b^Pañcavidhā^eb^ti vaṇṇavasena jātivasena ca.

[03]^b^Kho panassā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. Kāsika-saddo ativiya saṇhe sukhume mahagghavatthe niruḷho, aññasmimpi tathājātike ruḷhivasena pavattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akāsikaṃ candana’’^eb^nti. Hemante vāso hemantaṃ, hemantaṃ arahatīti ^b^hemantiko,^eb^ pāsādo. ^b^‘‘Itaresupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti vatvā tadeva nesaṃ arahataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha hemantiko’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sajālānī^eb^ti sajālavātapānāni, ^b^udakayantānī^eb^ti udakadhārāvissandanakayantāni. ^b^Pāsādamatthake^eb^ti pāsādassa upariākāsatale. ^b^Bandhitvā^eb^ti payojitayante sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ bandhitvā. ^b^Yantaṃ parivattetvā^eb^ti yathāpayojitaṃ yantaṃ pāsāṇāropanatthañceva puna tesaṃ vissajjanatthañca parivattetvā. ^b^Tasmiṃ vissajjentī^eb^ti chadanapiṭṭhe baddhasukkhamahiṃsacamme vissajjenti.

[03]^b^Sahassathāma^eb^nti purisasahassabalaṃ, purisasahassena vahitabbabhāravahaṃ. ^b^Pallaṅke nisinnovā^eb^ti ratanamayapallaṅke yathānisinno eva. ^b^Uppatanākārapatta^eb^nti uppatitvā ṭhitaṃ viya. ^b^Jiyaṃ pothentassā^eb^ti jiyāghātaṃ karontassa. ^b^Jiyappahārasaddo^eb^ti jiyāghātasaddo. ^b^Yante baddha^eb^nti yantabaddhaṃ katvā ^a^V2.0110^ea^ ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Saddantare^eb^ti thāmamajjhimassa purisassa saddasavanaṭṭhāne. Gāvutassa catuttho bhāgo kosotipi vuccati dvisahassadaṇḍappamāṇaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbaṭṭhānānī^eb^ti mahāpurisassa tāni tāni sabbāni vasanaṭṭhānāni. ^b^Sikhābaddho^eb^ti purisasabhāvasseva visesato dassanametaṃ. ^b^Na uppilāvitabhāvattha^eb^nti uppilāvitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ na kathesīti attho. Tassa hi bodhimūleyeva setughāto. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti appamādalakkhaṇassa ^a^M2.0120^ea^ dīpanato eva. ^b^Attānaṃ atikkamitvā^eb^ti attano jarāpattiṃ acintetvā aṭṭīyati. ^b^Na panesa maggena pahīno^eb^ tadā maggassa anadhigatattā. ^b^Sikkhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā^eb^ti yathāsamādinnasikkhaṃ pahāya.

[03]^b^Aviparītabyādhiādisabhāvāvā^eb^ti ekantena byādhiādisabhāvā eva. ^b^Evaṃ jigucchāvihārenā^eb^ti evaṃ sakalasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa jigucchanavihārena viharantassa. ^b^Evaṃ jigucchana^eb^nti evaṃ parassa jigucchanaṃ. ^b^Paraṃ ajigucchamāno^eb^ti karuṇāyanena evaṃ paraṃ ajigucchanto. ^b^Abhibhosmī^eb^ti abhibhavitā asmi. ^b^Ussāho ahū^eb^ti caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyameva catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyañca ahosi, yena maggabrahmacariyaparāyaṇo jāto.
[06]Sukhumālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame abhibhavitvā pavattanaṭṭhena adhipati yaṃ kiñci jeṭṭhakaṃ na kārakaṃ attānaṃ adhipatīti katvā attā eva adhipati, tato āgataṃ ^b^attādhipateyyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Loka^eb^nti sattalokaṃ. So ca kho iddhividhādiguṇavisesayutto adhippeto adhipatibhāvassa adhippetattā. ^b^Navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhamma^eb^nti ukkaṭṭhaniddesena vuttaṃ. ^b^Iti bhavo^eb^ti evaṃ sampattibhavo, tattha evaṃ abhivuddhīti. ^b^Sampattibhavassa hetū^eb^ti taṃtaṃsampattibhavassa tattha ca abhivuddhiyā hetu. Jātinimittassa kammabhavassa katūpacitattā ^b^jāti antopaviṭṭhā. Jarādīsupi eseva nayo^eb^ hetusiddhiyā phalasiddhito.

[03]^b^Asallīna^eb^nti na saṅkocappattaṃ. ^b^Upaṭṭhitā^eb^ti kāyādisabhāvasallakkhaṇavasena upaṭṭhitā. ^b^Asammuṭṭhā^eb^ sammosābhāvato. ^b^Asāraddho^eb^ti sārambhassa sārambhahetūnañca vikkhambhanena asāraddho. ^b^Ekaggaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0111^ea^ anekaggabhāvassa dūrasamussāpitattā. ^b^Nimmalaṃ katvā^eb^ti rāgādimalānaṃ apanayanena malarahitaṃ katvā. ^b^Gopāyatī^eb^ti saṃkilesānatthato rakkhati. ^b^Aya^eb^nti evaṃpaṭipanno bhikkhu. ^b^Suddhamattānaṃ pariharati^eb^ asuddhabhāvassa kilesassapi abhāvato.

[03]^b^Atikkamitvā^eb^^a^M2.0121^ea^^b^maññasī^eb^ti asakkhiṃ katvā maññasi. Tāya taṇhāya nibbattoti tammayo, taṇhāvasiko. Tassa bhāvo tammayatā, tassā ^b^tammayatāya^eb^ abhāvena. ^b^Na hāyati^eb^ paññādiguṇavepullappattiyā.
[06]Ādhipateyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Devadūtavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa paṭhame sammukho bhavati yena so sammukhībhāvo, purato vijjamānatā, tasmā ^b^sammukhībhāvā. Puññakamma^eb^nti dānasaṅkhātaṃ puññakammaṃ. ^b^Dve dhammā sulabhā^eb^ bāhirattā yathāsakaṃ paccayasamavāyena labbhanato. ^b^Saddhā pana dullabhā^eb^ pacurajanassa anavaṭṭhitakiccattā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘puthujjanassā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Sammukhībhāvasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye macchariyameva malaṃ macchariyamalaṃ, cittassa malīnasabhāvāpādanato vigataṃ macchariyamalaṃ etthāti ^b^vigatamacchariyamalaṃ^eb^. Gedhābhāvena koci kiñci dentopi tattha āsattiṃ na vissajjeti, ayaṃ pana na tādisoti āha ^b^‘‘vissaṭṭhacāgo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Malīnahatthova^eb^ cittavisuddhiyā ^a^V2.0112^ea^ abhāvato. ^b^Dhotahatthova^eb^ dhotahatthena kātabbakiccasādhanato. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā’’ti. ^b^Yācituṃ yutto^eb^ yācakānaṃ manorathapūraṇato. ^b^Yācayogo^eb^ payogāsahehi yācakehi suṭṭhu yuttabhāvato. Taṃsamaṅgī eva tattha rato nāma, na cittamattenevāti āha ^b^‘‘dānaṃ…pe… rato nāma hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^‘‘Uccā, bhante’’^eb^ti vatvā ayaṃ maṃ uccato vadatīti cinteyyāti puna ^b^‘‘nātiuccā tumhe’’^eb^ti āha, sarīrenāti adhippāyo. ^b^Mecakavaṇṇassā^eb^ti nīlobhāsassa. ^b^Pucchī^eb^ti bhikkhū pucchi. ^b^Bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ ^a^M2.0122^ea^ mañce nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchi ‘‘akhīṇāsavoti maññanā hotū’’ti. Tathā hi rājā khīṇāsavassa nāma…pe… nivatti. ^b^Dhajapaggahitāvā^eb^ti paggahitadhajāva. ^b^Silācetiyaṭṭhāna^eb^nti thūpārāmassa ca mahācetiyassa ca antare silāya katacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Cetiyaṃ…pe… aṭṭhāsi^eb^ sāvakassa taṃ kūṭāgāranti katvā.

[03]^b^Pacchābhāgenā^eb^ti dhammakathikassa therassa piṭṭhipassena. ^b^Gonaso^eb^ti maṇḍalasappo. Dhammassavanantarāya bahūnaṃ saggamaggappaṭilābhantarāyo bhaveyyāti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘dhammassavanantarāyaṃ na karissāmī’’^eb^ti cintesi. ^b^Visaṃ vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti vipassanātejena visavegaṃ vikkhambhetvā. ^b^Gāthāsahassa^eb^nti gāthāsahassavantaṃ. ^b^Paṭṭhānagāthāyā^eb^ti paṭṭhāpanagāthāya, ādigāthāyāti attho. ^b^Paṭṭhāna…pe… avasānagāthaṃ eva vavatthapesi,^eb^ na dvinnaṃ antare vuttaṃ kilantakāyattā. ^b^Sarabhāṇaṃ^eb^ sāyanhadhammakathā. ^b^Paggaṇhātī^eb^ti paccakkhaṃ karontī gaṇhāti, sakkaccaṃ suṇātīti attho. Dhammakathanadivase dhammakathikānaṃ akilamanatthaṃ saddhā upāsakā siniddhabhojanaṃ madhupānakañca denti sarassa madhurabhāvāya sappimadhukatelādiñca bhesajjaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ariyavaṃsaṃ kathessāmī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Catūhi dāṭhāhi ḍaṃsitvā^eb^ti daḷhadaṭṭhabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^Carissāmī^eb^ti sammānessāmi, sakkaccaṃ suṇissāmīti attho. ^b^Nimmathetvā^eb^ti nimmadditvā, apanetvāti attho.
[06]Tiṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye attho nāma phalaṃ, taṃ etassa vasoti ^b^atthavaso^eb^. Hetu, attho etassa atthīti attho, so evāti āha ^b^‘‘tayo atthe tīṇi kāraṇānī’’^eb^ti. Dhammadesanā nāma ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ^a^V2.0113^ea^ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pakāsanāti āha ^b^‘‘catusaccadhammaṃ pakāsetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṭṭhakathaṃ ñāṇena paṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti pāḷipadānaṃ atthaṃ vivaraṇañāṇena paṭi paṭi saṃvedanasīlo ‘‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho’’ti. Etena atthapaṭisambhidābyāpāramāha. ^b^Pāḷidhammaṃ paṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti pāḷigatiṃ pāḷiṃ padavivaraṇaṃ paṭi paṭi saṃvedanasīlo. Etena dhammapaṭisambhidābyāpāramāha.
[06]Atthavasasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^M2.0123^ea^^b^pavattinī^eb^ti yāva adhippetatthanigamanā avicchedena pavattinī. Paṭighātābhāvena ^b^appaṭihatā. Niyyānikā^eb^ sappāṭihīrakā.
[06]Kathāpavattisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^paṇḍitapaññattānī^eb^ti paṇḍitehi paṭhamaṃ paññattāni. ^b^Kathitānī^eb^ti seyyaso kathitāni. ^b^Mahāpurisehī^eb^ti buddhabodhisattehi. ^b^Karuṇā^eb^ti karuṇācetovimutti vuttā. ^b^Pubbabhāgo^eb^ti tassa upacāro. ^b^Damoti indriyasaṃvaro^eb^ ‘‘manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ damana’’nti katvā. ^b^Attadamana^eb^nti cittadamanaṃ. ^b^Puṇṇovāde^eb^ (ma. ni. 3.396) ‘‘sakkhissasi kho, tvaṃ puṇṇa, iminā damūpasamenā’’ti āgatattā ^b^damoti vuttā khantipi. Āḷavake^eb^ āḷavakasutte (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. 190) ‘‘saccā damā cāgā’’ti evaṃ ^b^vuttā paññāpi^eb^ imasmiṃ sutte ‘‘damo’’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Rakkhanaṃ gopanaṃ paṭijaggana^eb^nti mātāpitūnaṃ manussāmanussakatūpaddavato rakkhanaṃ, byādhiādianatthato gopanaṃ, ghāsacchādanādīhi veyyāvaccakaraṇena paṭijagganaṃ. ^b^Santo nāma^eb^ sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhūpasamena upasantakāyavacīsamācāratāya ca. ^b^Uttamaṭṭhena santāna^eb^nti matteyyatādīhi seṭṭhaṭṭhena santānaṃ.

[03]^b^Idha imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ karaṇenā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte āgatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ karaṇena nibbattanena. ^b^Etāni…pe… kāraṇānī^eb^ti mātupaṭṭhānaṃ pitupaṭṭhānanti etāni dve uttamapurisānaṃ ^a^V2.0114^ea^ kāraṇāni. Uttamakiccakaraṇena hi mātāpituupaṭṭhākā ‘‘uttamapurisā’’ti vuttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mātāpitu…pe… vutto’’^eb^ti. Anupaddavabhāvena ^b^khemaṃ^eb^.
[06]Paṇḍitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M2.0124^ea^^b^lokiyalokuttaramissaka^eb^nti ettha ‘‘manussā puññaṃ pasavantī’’ti avisesena vuttattā bhāvanāmayassapi puññassa saṅgaṇhanato lokuttarassapi sambhavo daṭṭhabbo.
[06]Sīlavantasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame samecca sambhūya paccayehi kataṃ ^b^saṅkhataṃ. Nimittānī^eb^ti sañjānanassa nimittāni. Hetupaccayasamavāye uppajjanaṃ ^b^uppādo,^eb^ attalābho. ^b^Vayo^eb^ti bhaṅgo. ^b^Ṭhitassā^eb^ti uppādakkhaṇato uddhaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇapattassa. Sā panassa avatthā uppādāvatthāya bhinnāti katvā aññathattaṃ jarāti ca vuttā. Yasmā dhammo uppajjamāno eva bhijjati, tathā sati uppādabhaṅgā samānakkhaṇā siyuṃ, na ca taṃ yujjati, tasmā uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthā jarāti veditabbā. Ye pana ‘‘saṅkhārānaṃ ṭhiti natthī’’ti vadanti, tesaṃ taṃ micchā. Yathā hi tasseva dhammassa uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā icchitā, aññathā ‘‘aññaṃ uppajjati, aññaṃ nirujjhatī’’ti āpajjati, evaṃ uppajjamānassa bhaṅgābhimukhā dhammā icchitabbā. Sā ca ṭhitikkhaṇo. Na hi uppajjamāno bhijjatīti sakkā viññātunti.

[03]^b^Saṅkhatanti tebhūmakā dhammā^eb^ paccayasamuppannattā. Yadi evaṃ maggaphaladhammā kathanti āha ^b^‘‘maggaphalāni panā’’^eb^tiādi. Lakkhaṇakathā hi yāvadeva sammasanatthā. ^b^Uppādakkhaṇe uppādo,^eb^ na ṭhānabhaṅgakkhaṇesu. Kasmā? Uppādauppādakkhaṇānaṃ aññamaññaṃ paricchinnattā. Yathā hi uppādasaṅkhātena vikārena uppādakkhaṇo paricchinno, evaṃ uppādakkhaṇenapi uppādo paricchinno. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Dhammappavattimattatāyapi kālassa lokasamaññāvaseneva vuttaṃ. ^b^Lakkhaṇaṃ na saṅkhataṃ, saṅkhataṃ na lakkhaṇa^eb^nti nesaṃ bhedadassanaṃ. Avatthāvato hi avatthā bhinnāvāti ^a^V2.0115^ea^. ^b^Paricchinna^eb^nti ettha uppādavayehi tāva saṅkhataṃ paricchinnaṃ hotu, jarāya pana taṃ kathaṃ paricchinnanti vuccati? Na vuccati paricchedo pubbantāparantamattena, atha kho sabhāvabhedenāti nāyaṃ doso. ^b^Saṅkhataṃ^eb^ dhammajātaṃ ^b^paricchinnaṃ^eb^ tabbantaṃ dhammajātaṃ ^a^M2.0125^ea^ saṅkhatanti paññāyati evaṃ tesaṃ abhāvena nibbānametanti lakkhitabbato sañjānitabbato. Idāni ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādinā yathāvuttamattaṃ upamāhi vibhāveti.
[06]Saṅkhatalakkhaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^asaṅkhatassā^eb^ti vuttanayena na saṅkhatassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paccayehī’’^eb^tiādi. Yathā uppādādīnaṃ bhāvena saṅkhatadhammajātaṃ saṅkhatanti paññāyati, evaṃ tesaṃ abhāvena nibbānaṃ asaṅkhatanti paññāyati.
[06]Asaṅkhatalakkhaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame idha ^b^sāla^eb^-saddo rukkhasāmaññapariyāyo, na rukkhavisesapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘mahāsālāti mahārukkhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kulajeṭṭhaka^eb^nti tasmiṃ kule jeṭṭhabhūtaṃ sāmibhūtaṃ. ^b^Silāmayo^eb^ na paṃsumayo missako ca. Gāmaṃ gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ araññanti āha ^b^‘‘araññasminti agāmakaṭṭhāne’’^eb^ti. Mahanto pabbato seloti yojanā.
[06]Pabbatarājasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^sarīrasambhavāna^eb^nti sarīre sambhūtānaṃ. ^b^Dukkhāna^eb^nti aniṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Bahalāna^eb^nti nirantarappavattiyā aviraḷānaṃ. ^b^Tāpanavasenā^eb^ti dukkhāpanavasena. ^b^Tibbāna^eb^nti kurūrānaṃ. Tāsaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ adhivāsanāya pahātabbadukkhavedanānaṃ pajahanaṃ nāma khamanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘khamanatthāyā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0116^ea^. ^b^Āṇāpetvā^eb^ti ‘‘ātappaṃ karaṇīya’’nti buddhāṇaṃ vidhāya. ^b^Lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā^eb^ sasambhārānaṃ maggadhammānaṃ kathitattā.
[06]Ātappakaraṇīyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame ^a^M2.0126^ea^ mahābalavacoro ^b^mahācoro^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘mahanto balavacoro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Balavacoro^eb^ti ca mahāthāmatāya mahāparivāratāya mahācoriyakammasamatthatāya ca veditabbo. Mahataṃ gāmanigamānaṃ viluppanaṃ ^b^mahāvilopo. Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ akaraṇameva kāraṇaṃ katvā tappaṭibaddhāya kathāya pakkhipitvā. ^b^Atthaṃ kathayissantī^eb^ti tassa tassa atthañca kathayissanti. ^b^Harantā^eb^ti apanentā pariharantā. ^b^Dasavatthukāyā^eb^ti ‘‘sassato loko’’ti (ma. ni. 1.269) ādidasavatthusannissitāya. ^b^Antaṃ gahetvā ṭhitadiṭṭhiyā^eb^ti tameva sassatādiantaṃ gahetvā avissajjetvā ṭhitadiṭṭhiyā.
[06]Mahācorasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Cūḷavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Brāhmaṇavaggassa ^a^M2.0127^ea^^a^V2.0117^ea^ paṭhame ^b^jarājiṇṇā^eb^ti jarāvasena jiṇṇā, na byādhiādīnaṃ vasena jiṇṇasadisattā jiṇṇā. ^b^Vayovuddhā^eb^ti vayaso vuddhippattiyā vuddhā, na sīlādivuddhiyā. ^b^Jātimahallakā^eb^ti jātiyā mahantatāya cirarattaññutāya jātimahallakā. ^b^Tayo addhe atikkantā^eb^ti paṭhamo, majjhimo, pacchimoti tayo addhe atītā. ^b^Tatiyaṃ vayaṃ anuppattā^eb^ti tato eva pacchimaṃ vayaṃ anuppattā. ^b^Akatabhayaparittāṇā^eb^ti ettha ^b^bhayaparittāṇa^eb^nti duggatibhayato parittāyakaṃ puññaṃ, taṃ akataṃ etehīti akatabhayaparittāṇā. ^b^Patiṭṭhākamma^eb^nti sugatisaṅkhātappatiṭṭhāvahaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Upasaṃharīyatī^eb^ti sampāpīyati. ‘‘Upanīyatī’’ti vuttaṃ, kiṃ kena upanīyatīti āha ^b^‘‘ayañhi jātiyā jaraṃ upanīyatī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aya^eb^nti loko. Jāto na jātabhāveneva tiṭṭhati, atha kho tato paraṃ jaraṃ pāpīyati, jarāya byādhiṃ pāpīyati. Evaṃ parato paraṃ dukkhameva upanīyati.

[03]^b^Tāyanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti rakkhanaṭṭhena. ^b^Nilīyanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti nilīnaṭṭhānabhāvena. ^b^Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti patiṭṭhānabhāvena. ^b^Avassayanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti avassayitabbabhāvena. ^b^Uttamagativasenā^eb^ti paramagatibhāvena.
[06]Paṭhamadvebrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye bhajitabbaṭṭhena paresaṃ bhājitabbaṭṭhena ^b^bhājanaṃ,^eb^ bhaṇḍakaṃ.
[06]Dutiyadvebrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^54-55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^V2.0118^ea^^a^M2.0128^ea^ yesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ appahānena purisassa attabyābādhādīnaṃ sambhavo, pahānena asambhavoti evaṃ rāgādīnaṃ pahāyako ariyadhammo mahānubhāvatāya mahānisaṃsatāya ca sāmaṃ passitabboti ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^. Iminā nayena sesesu padesupi yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vattabbo. Saddattho pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.147) vuttanayena veditabbo. Catutthaṃ uttānatthameva.
[06]Aññatarabrāhmaṇasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^na kālantare pattabba^eb^nti yadā saccappaṭivedho, tadā eva laddhabbattā na kālantare pattabbaṃ. Maggañāṇena upanetabbattā upaneyyaṃ. Upaneyyameva ^b^opaneyyika^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘paṭipattiyā upagantabba’’^eb^nti.
[06]Nibbutasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^ācariyapācariyāna^eb^nti ācariyānampi ācariyānaṃ. ^b^Nirantaraphuṭo nerayikasattehi^eb^ nirayagāmikammassa kārakānaṃ bahubhāvā. ^b^Ubhayampeta^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ atthadvayaṃ. ^b^Ghananivāsata^eb^nti gāmānaṃ ghanasannivāsataṃ. ^b^Ekanteneva adhammo^eb^ti ayonisomanasikārahetukattā anatthahetutāya ca niyameneva adhammo. ^b^Na adhammarāgoti adhippeto^eb^ti paraparikkhāresu rāgo viya na mahāsāvajjoti katvā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi sakasakaparikkhāravisayo rāgo visamalobho viya na ekantato apāyuppattijanako. Paraparikkhāresu uppajjamānassa mahāsāvajjatāya ^b^adhammarāgatā. Lobhassa samakālo nāma natthi^eb^ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ viya ayonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā. ^b^Esā^eb^ti eso pāpadhammo. ^b^Samalobho^eb^ visamalakkhaṇābhāvato. Tathā hi taṃsamuṭṭhāno payogo micchācāroti ^a^M2.0129^ea^ na vuccati. ^b^Avatthupaṭisevanasaṅkhātenā^eb^ti yaṃ lokiyasādhusamanuññātaṃ rāgassa vatthuṭṭhānaṃ, tato aññasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭisevanasaṅkhātena.

[03]^b^Vividhasassāna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0119^ea^ sālivīhiādinānappakārasassānaṃ. ^b^Dussassa^eb^nti paccayadūsena dūsitaṃ sassaṃ. ^b^Sampajjamāne^eb^ti nipphajjanato pageva gabbhaparivuddhikāle. ^b^Pāṇakā^eb^ti salabhādipāṇakā. ^b^Patantī^eb^ti sassānaṃ matthake patanti. ^b^Salākāmattameva sampajjatī^eb^ti vaḍḍhitvā gabbhaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthaṃ sampajjati. ^b^Te^eb^ti vāḷaamanussā. ^b^Laddhokāsā^eb^ti yakkhādhipatīhi anuññātattā laddhokāsā.
[06]Palokasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^mahāvipāka^eb^nti uḷāraphalaṃ bahuvipākaṃ. ^b^Dhammo nāma^eb^ kathitakathā ‘‘atthaṃ dahati vidahatī’’ti katvā. ^b^Anudhammo nāma^eb^ paṭikathanaṃ ‘‘taṃ anugato dhammo’’ti katvā. Saha dhammenāti sahadhammo, so eva ^b^sahadhammiko^eb^. Dhammasaddo cettha kāraṇapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘sakāraṇo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vādassā^eb^ti vacanassa. ^b^Anupāto^eb^ anupacchā pavatti.

[03]Paripanthe tiṭṭhatīti ^b^pāripanthiko^eb^. Panthe ṭhatvā paresaṃ sāpateyyaṃ chindanato ^b^panthadūhanacoro^eb^. Yadi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ, kathaṃ taṃ asekkhanti āha ^b^‘‘asekkhassa pavattattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itarānī^eb^ti sīlakkhandhādīni. ^b^Sayampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo ‘‘asekkhassa pavattā cā’’ti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti.

[03]^b^Nibbisevano^eb^ti visevanarahito vigatavilomabhāvo. ^b^Na upaparikkhantī^eb^ti na vicārenti. Jātiṃ nibbattiṃ yāti upagacchatīti ^b^jātiyo,^eb^ jātoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yattha katthaci kulajāte’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kevalī^eb^ti kevalavā, pāripūrimāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇabhāvena yutto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ kevalīti padaṃ. ^b^Abhiññāpāra^eb^nti abhijānassa pāraṃ. Pariyantaṃ gatattā ^b^pāragū^eb^. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. ^b^Khettavinicchayasavanenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0130^ea^ ‘‘imehi sīlādiguṇasampannā sadevake loke puññassa khettaṃ, tadañño na khetta’’nti evaṃ khettavinicchayasavanena rahitā.
[03]Vacchagottasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^59^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0120^ea^^b^durāsadā^eb^ti durupasaṅkamanā. ^b^Garahā muccissatī^eb^ti mayi evaṃ kathente samaṇo gotamo kiñci kathessati, evaṃ me vacanamattampi na laddhanti ayaṃ garahā muccissatīti. ^b^Paṇḍitā^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgatā. ^b^Dhīrā^eb^ti dhitisampannā. ^b^Byattā^eb^ti paravādamaddanasamatthena veyyattiyena samannāgatā. ^b^Bahussutā^eb^ti bāhusaccavanto. ^b^Vādino^eb^ti vādimaggakusalā. ^b^Sammatā^eb^ti bahuno janassa sādhusammatā. ^b^Paṇḍitādiākārapariccheda^eb^nti tesaṃ tevijjānaṃ paṇḍitākārādiākāraparicchedaṃ. Ākārasaddo kāraṇapariyāyo, paricchedasaddo parimāṇatthoti āha ^b^‘‘ettakena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Yathā^eb^ti yenākārena, yena kāraṇenāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathāti kāraṇavacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Dvīhipi pakkhehī’’^eb^ti vatvā te pakkhe sarūpato dassento ^b^‘‘mātito ca pitito cā’’^eb^ti āha. Tesaṃ pakkhānaṃ vasenassa sujātataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassa mātā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Janakajanikābhāvena vināpi loke mātāpitusamaññā dissati, idha pana sā orasaputtavaseneva icchitāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saṃsuddhagahaṇiko’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti dhāretīti ^b^gahaṇī,^eb^ gabbhāsayasaññito mātukucchippadeso. Yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipācanavasena gaṇhanato achaḍḍanato ^b^gahaṇī,^eb^ kammajatejodhātu.

[03]Pitā ca mātā ca pitaro, pitūnaṃ pitaro pitāmahā, tesaṃ yugo ^b^pitāmahayugo,^eb^ tasmā ‘‘yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahadvandā’’ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana dvandaṃ aggahetvā ‘‘yuganti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccatī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Yuga^eb^-saddassa ca atthakathā dassitā ^b^‘‘pitāmahoyeva^eb^^a^M2.0131^ea^^b^pitāmahayuga’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pubbapurisā^eb^ti purisaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi ‘‘mātito’’ti pāḷivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. ^b^Akkhitto^eb^ti akkhepo. ^b^Anavakkhitto^eb^ti saddhathālipākādīsu anavakkhitto na chaḍḍito. ^b^Jātivādenā^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kena kāraṇenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca ‘‘ubhato…pe… pitāmahayugā’’ti etena brāhmaṇassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikatākittanato. ‘‘Akkhitto’’ti iminā kiriyāparādhābhāvo. Saṃsuddhajātikāpi hi sattā kiriyāparādhena khepaṃ pāpuṇanti. ‘‘Anupakkuṭṭho’’ti iminā ayuttasaṃsaggābhāvo. Ayuttasaṃsaggañhi paṭicca sattā suddhajātikā kiriyāparādharahitāpi akkosaṃ labhanti.
[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0121^ea^ garahāvacanaṃ. ^b^Mante parivattetī^eb^ti vede sajjhāyati, pariyāpuṇātīti attho. ^b^Mante dhāretī^eb^ti yathāadhīte mante asammuṭṭhe katvā hadaye ṭhapeti.

[03]^b^Oṭṭhapahatakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti atthāvadhāraṇavasena. ^b^Sanighaṇḍukeṭubhāna^eb^nti ettha vacanīyavācakabhāvena atthaṃ saddañca khaṇḍati bhindati vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu, so eva idha kha-kārassa gha-kāraṃ katvā ^b^‘‘nighaṇḍū’’^eb^ti vutto. Kiṭati gameti kiriyādivibhāgaṃ, taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato gamento pūretīti ^b^keṭubhaṃ. Vevacanappakāsaka^eb^nti pariyāyasaddadīpakaṃ, ekekassa atthassa anekapariyāyavacanavibhāvakanti attho. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ anekesampi atthānaṃ ekasaddavacanīyatāvibhāvanavasenapi tassa ganthassa pavattattā. Vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati vikappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo, so pana vaṇṇapadasambandhapadatthādivibhāgato bahukappoti āha ^b^‘‘kiriyākappavikappo’’^eb^ti. Idañca mūlakiriyākappaganthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi mahāvisayo satasahassaparimāṇo namācariyādippakaraṇaṃ. Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etehīti ^b^akkharappabhedā,^eb^ sikkhāniruttiyo. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti catunnaṃ vedānaṃ.

[03]^b^Pada^eb^nti ^a^M2.0132^ea^ catubbidhaṃ, pañcavidhaṃ vā padaṃ, taṃ padaṃ kāyatīti ^b^padako,^eb^ teyeva vā vede padaso kāyatīti ^b^padako. Tadavasesa^eb^nti vuttāvasesaṃ vākyaṃ. Ettāvatā saddabyākaraṇaṃ vatvā puna ‘‘byākaraṇa’’nti atthabyākaraṇamāha. Taṃ taṃ saddaṃ tadatthañca byākaroti byācikkhati etenāti ^b^byākaraṇaṃ,^eb^ saddasatthaṃ. Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti ^b^lokāyataṃ^eb^. Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.

[03]^b^Asīti mahāsāvakā^eb^ti aññāsikoṇḍañño, vappo, bhaddiyo, mahānāmo, assaji, nāḷako, yaso, vimalo, subāhu, puṇṇaji, gavampati, uruvelakassapo, nadīkassapo, gayākassapo, sāriputto, mahāmoggallāno, mahākassapo, mahākaccāno, mahākoṭṭhiko, mahākappino, mahācundo, anuruddho, kaṅkhārevato, ānando, nandako, bhagu, nandiyo, kimilo, bhaddiyo, rāhulo, sīvali, upāli, dabbo, upaseno, khadiravaniyarevato, puṇṇo mantāniputto, puṇṇo sunāparantako, soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo, soṇo koḷiviso, rādho, subhūti, aṅgulimālo, vakkali, kāḷudāyī, mahāudāyī, pilindavaccho, sobhito, kumārakassapo, raṭṭhapālo, vaṅgīso, sabhiyo, selo, upavāṇo, meghiyo, sāgato, nāgito, lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo, piṇḍolo bhāradvājo, mahāpanthako, cūḷapanthako, bākulo, kuṇḍadhāno, dārucīriyo, yasojo, ajito ^a^V2.0122^ea^, tissametteyyo, puṇṇako, mettagu, dhotako, upasīvo, nando, hemako, todeyyo, kappo, jatukaṇṇī, bhadrāvudho, udayo, posalo, mogharājā, piṅgiyoti ete asīti mahāsāvakā nāma.

[03]Kasmā panete eva therā ‘‘mahāsāvakā’’ti vuccantīti? Abhinīhārassa mahantabhāvato. Tathā hi dve aggasāvakāpi mahāsāvakesu antogadhā. Te hi sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakappattiyā sāvakesu aggadhammādhigamena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhitāpi abhinīhāramahantatāsāmaññena ‘‘mahāsāvakā’’tipi vuccanti, itare pana pakatisāvakehi sātisayaṃ mahābhinīhārā. Tathā hi te padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle katapaṇidhānā, tato eva sātisayaṃ abhiññāsamāpattīsu vasino pabhinnappaṭisambhidā ca. Kāmaṃ sabbepi arahanto sīlavisuddhiādike sampādetvā catūsu ^a^M2.0133^ea^ satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā maggappaṭipāṭiyā anavasesato kilese khepetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhahanti, tathāpi yathā saddhāvimuttato diṭṭhippattassa, paññāvimuttato ca ubhatobhāgavimuttassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāvisesasiddho maggabhāvanāviseso, evaṃ abhinīhāramahantattapubbayogamahantattā hi sasantāne sātisayassa guṇavisesassa nipphāditattā sīlādīhi guṇehi mahantā sāvakāti mahāsāvakā. Tesuyeva pana ye bodhipakkhiyadhammesu pāmokkhabhāvena dhurabhūtānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ kiccānubhāvanipphattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya tajjābhinīhārābhinīhaṭāya sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ cirakālasambhāvitāya sammāpaṭipattiyā yathākkamaṃ paññāya samādhismiñca ukkaṭṭhapāramippattiyā savisesaṃ sabbaguṇehi aggabhāve ṭhitā, te sāriputtamoggallānā. Itare aṭṭhasattati therā sāvakapāramiyā matthake sabbasāvakānaṃ aggabhāvena aṭṭhitattā ‘‘mahāsāvakā’’icceva vuccanti. Pakatisāvakā pana abhinīhāramahantattābhāvato pubbayogamahantattābhāvato ca ‘‘satthusāvakā’’icceva vuccanti. Te pana aggasāvakā viya mahāsāvakā viya ca na parimitā, atha kho anekasatā anekasahassā.

[03]Vayatīti ^b^vayo,^eb^ ādimajjhapariyosānesu katthaci aparikilamanto avitthāyanto te ganthe santāneti paṇetīti attho. Dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ gamentīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘avayo na hotī’’^eb^ti vatvā tattha avayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘avayo nāma…pe… na sakkotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādivacanaṃ. Tatiyavijjādhigamāya paṭipattikkamo ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.70) sātisayaṃ vitthārito, tathā ^a^V2.0123^ea^ idha avattukāmatāya ^b^bhayabheravasuttā^eb^dīsu (ma. ni. 1.34 ādayo) viya saṅkhepato ca vattukāmatāya ‘‘dvinnaṃ vijjāna’’micceva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Vijjā^eb^ti pubbenivāsappaṭicchādakassa mohakkhandhassa vijjanaṭṭhenapi vijjā. ^b^Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamoti vuccati^eb^ tamo viyāti katvā. Kātabbato karaṇaṃ, obhāsova karaṇaṃ ^b^obhāsakaraṇaṃ,^eb^ attano paccayehi obhāsabhāvena nibbattetabbaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^Ayaṃ attho^eb^ti ^a^M2.0134^ea^ ayameva adhippetattho. ^b^Pasaṃsāvacana^eb^nti tasseva atthassa thomanāvacanaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanapavattivisesānaṃ bodhanato. ^b^Yojanā^eb^ti pasaṃsāvasena vuttapadānaṃ atthadassanavasena vuttapadassa ca yojanā. ^b^Avijjā vihatā^eb^ti etena vijjanaṭṭhena vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Yasmā vijjā uppannā^eb^ti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā, paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti. ^b^Itarasmimpi padadvaye^eb^ti ‘‘tamo vihato, āloko uppanno’’ti padadvayepi. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti yathāvuttayojanaṃ atidisati. Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – evaṃ adhigatavijjassa tamo vihato viddhasto. Kasmā? Yasmā āloko uppanno ñāṇāloko pātubhūtoti. ^b^Pesitattassā^eb^ti yathādhippetatthasiddhippattiṃ vissaṭṭhacittassa, paṭhamavijjādhigamāya pesitacittassāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Vipassanāpādaka^eb^nti iminā tassa jhānacittassa nibbedhabhāgiyatamāha. Vipassanā tividhā vipassakapuggalabhedena. Mahābodhisattānañhi paccekabodhisattānañca vipassanā cintāmayañāṇasaṃvaḍḍhitattā sayambhuñāṇabhūtā, itaresaṃ sutamayañāṇasaṃvaḍḍhitattā paropadesasambhūtā. Sā ‘‘ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā’’tiādinā anekadhā arūpamukhavasena catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ aññataramukhavasena ca anekadhāva ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.306) nānānayato vibhāvitā. Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato nānānayaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayassa ariyamaggañāṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pubbabhāgañāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumataraṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ hoti, yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ‘‘mahāvajirañāṇa’’nti vuccati. Yassa ca pavattivibhāgena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassappabhedassa pādakabhāvena samāpajjiyamānā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ satthu vaḷañjanakasamāpattiyo vuccanti, svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro paramatthamañjūsāyaṃ ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.144) dassito, atthikehi tato gahetabboti. Idha pana sāvakānaṃ vipassanācāraṃ sandhāya ‘‘vipassanāpādaka’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Kāmaṃ ^a^M2.0135^ea^^a^V2.0124^ea^ heṭṭhimamaggañāṇānipi āsavānaṃ khepanañāṇāni eva, anavasesato pana tesaṃ khepanaṃ aggamaggañāṇenevāti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggañāṇatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āsavavināsanato^eb^ti āsavānaṃ nissesaṃ samucchindanato. Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti dassento ^b^‘‘tatra cetaṃ ñāṇa’’^eb^nti vatvā ^b^‘‘khaye’’^eb^ti ādhāre bhummaṃ, na visayeti dassento ^b^‘‘tattha pariyāpannattā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Abhinīharatī^eb^ti abhimukhaṃ nīharati, yathā maggābhisamayo hoti, savanaṃ tadabhimukhaṃ pavatteti. ^b^Idaṃ dukkha^eb^nti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa tadā bhikkhunā paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^Ettakaṃ dukkha^eb^nti tassa paricchijja gahitabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^Na ito bhiyyo^eb^ti tassa anavasesato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbampi dukkhasacca’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhenā^eb^ti sabhāvasaṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa asammohato paṭivijjhanena. Asammohapaṭivedhoti ca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhasaccassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavatti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’’^eb^ti. Dukkhaṃ samudeti etasmāti ^b^dukkhasamudayo. Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā^eb^ti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma. ^b^Patvā^eb^ti ca tadubhayavato puggalassa pavattiyāti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Patvā^eb^ti vā pāpuṇanahetu. ^b^Appavatti^eb^nti appavattinimittaṃ. Te vā na pavattanti etthāti appavatti, nibbānaṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti dukkhanirodhassa. ^b^Sampāpaka^eb^nti sacchikiriyāvasena sammadeva pāpakaṃ.

[03]^b^Kilesavasenā^eb^ti āsavasaṅkhātakilesavasena. Yasmā āsavānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāyo tappariyāpannattā sesasaccānañca taṃsamudayādipariyāyo atthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pariyāyato’’^eb^ti. Dassento saccānīti yojanā. Āsavānañcettha gahaṇaṃ ‘‘āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā’’ti āraddhattā. Tathā hi ‘‘kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī’’tiādinā āsavavimuttisīseneva sabbakilesavimutti vuttā. ‘‘Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’’tiādinā missakamaggo idha kathitoti ^b^‘‘saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Jānato passato^eb^ti iminā pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayā vuttā. ^b^Vimuccatī^eb^ti iminā pahānābhisamayo vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘iminā maggakkhaṇaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jānato^eb^^a^M2.0136^ea^^b^passato^eb^ti vā hetuniddeso. Yaṃ jānanahetu kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatīti yojanā. Dhammānañhi samānakālikānampi paccayapaccayuppannatā sahajātakoṭiyā labbhati. Bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva ettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Khīṇā jātītiādīhi^eb^ padehi. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa. ^b^Bhūmi^eb^nti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yenādhippāyena ‘‘katamā panassā’’tiādinā codanā katā, taṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘na tāvassā’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^V2.0125^ea^. Tattha ^b^na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā^eb^ maggabhāvanāyāti adhippāyo. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘pubbeva khīṇattā’’^eb^ti. Na anāgatā assa jāti khīṇāti yojanā. ^b^Na anāgatā^eb^ti ca anāgatabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena codeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anāgate vāyāmābhāvato’’^eb^ti. Anāgataviseso panettha adhippeto, tassa khepane vāyāmo labbhateva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yā pana maggassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesū^eb^ti bhavattayaggahaṇaṃ vuttanayena anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ jātiṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti khīṇāsavo bhikkhu.

[03]Brahmacariyavāso nāma idha maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘parivuttha’’^eb^nti. Sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇā pavatti, itaresu ca saccesu nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena pavatti pākaṭā eva. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sattasekhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Itthattāyā^eb^ti ime pakārā itthaṃ, tabbhāvo itthattaṃ, tadatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃsoḷasavidhakiccabhāvāyā’’^eb^ti. Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, pariññādīsu ca pahānameva padhānaṃ tadatthattā itaresanti āha ^b^‘‘kilesakkhayāya vā’’^eb^ti. Pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. Dutiyavikappe ^b^itthattāyā^eb^ti nissakke sampadānavacananti āha ^b^‘‘itthabhāvato’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0137^ea^. ^b^Apara^eb^nti anāgataṃ. Ime pana carimakattabhāvasaṅkhātā pañcakkhandhā. ^b^Pariññātā tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti etena tesaṃ appatiṭṭhataṃ dasseti. Apariññāmūlakā hi patiṭṭhā. Yathāha ‘‘kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha’’ntiādi (saṃ. ni. 2.64; kathā. 296; mahāni. 7). Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘chinnamūlakā rukkhā viyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Yassā^eb^ti puthujjanassa. Tassa hi sīlaṃ kadāci vaḍḍhati, kadāci hāyati. Sekkhāpi pana sīlesu paripūrakārinova, asekkhesu vattabbameva natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khīṇāsavassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vasippatta^eb^nti vasībhāvappattaṃ. ^b^Suṭṭhu samāhita^eb^nti aggaphalasamādhinā sammadeva samāhitaṃ. ^b^Dhitisampanna^eb^nti aggaphaladhitiyā samannāgataṃ. ^b^Maccuṃ jahitvā ṭhita^eb^nti āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ punabbhavābhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘sabbe pāpadhamme pajahitvā ṭhita’’^eb^nti. Sabbassapi ñeyyadhammassa catusaccantogadhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘buddhanti catusaccabuddha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Buddhasāvakā^eb^ti sāvakabuddhā namassanti, ^a^V2.0126^ea^ pageva itarā pajā. Itarā hi pajā sāvakepi namassanti. Iti ettakena ṭhānena sammāsambuddhassa vasena gāthānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā idāni sāvakassapi vasena atthaṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sāvakopi gotamo^eb^ mukhanibbattena sampattena sambandhena, yato sabbepi ariyasāvakā bhagavato orasaputtāti vuccantīti.

[03]Nivussatīti ^b^nivāso,^eb^ nivuttho khandhasantānoti āha ^b^‘‘nivutthakkhandhaparampara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Aveti, avedī^eb^ti pāṭhadvayenapi pubbenivāsañāṇassa kiccasiddhiṃyeva dasseti. Ekattakāyaekattasaññibhāvasāmaññato vehapphalāpi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti ^b^‘‘cha kāmāvacare, nava brahmaloke’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Itare pana apacurabhāvato na vuttā. Ekaccānaṃ avisayabhāvato ca avacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jāti khīyati etenāti ^b^jātikkhayo,^eb^ arahattanti āha ^b^‘‘arahattaṃ patto’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Abhiññāyā’’ti vattabbe yakāralopena ‘‘abhiññā’’ti niddeso katoti āha ^b^‘‘jānitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kiccavosānenā^eb^ti catūhi maggehi kattabbassa soḷasavidhassa kiccassa pariyosānena. ^b^Vosito^eb^ti pariyosito, niṭṭhitoti attho. ^b^Moneyyena samannāgato^eb^ti kāyamoneyyādīhi samannāgato. Lapitaṃ ^a^M2.0138^ea^ lapatīti ^b^lapitalāpano. Attapaccakkhato ñatvā^eb^ti iminā tesaṃ vijjānaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
[06]Tikaṇṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^60^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^deyyadhammassetaṃ nāma^eb^nti yāgaṃ karontena dātabbadeyyadhammaṃ sandhāya vadati tadaññassa pāḷiyaṃ deyyadhammaggahaṇeneva gahitattā. ^b^Matakabhatta^eb^nti matake uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ, pitupiṇḍanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Varapurisāna^eb^nti visiṭṭhapurisānaṃ, uttamapurisānanti attho. ^b^Sabbametaṃ dāna^eb^nti yathāvuttabhedaṃ yaññasaddhādidānaṃ.
[06]Jāṇussoṇisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame jiṇṇānaṃ hatthisālādīnaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ puna pākatikakaraṇaṃ jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ ^a^V2.0127^ea^, tassa kārako ^b^jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇakārako. Bāhirasamaye^eb^ti satthusāsanato bāhire aññatitthiyasamaye. ^b^Sabbacatukkenā^eb^tiādīsu sabbesu dvipadacatuppadādibhedesu pāṇesu ekekasmiṃ cattāro cattāro pāṇe vadhitvā yajitabbaṃ yaññaṃ sabbacatukkaṃ nāma. Sesesupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Yassa vā tassa vā^eb^ti nissakke sāmivacananti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā vā tasmā vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evamassāya^eb^nti ettha ^b^assū^eb^ti nipātamattanti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ santepi aya’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Vaḍḍhento^eb^ti paṭṭhapento. Maggabrahmacariyassa ogadhaṃ mūlaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ ^b^brahmacariyogadhaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggasaṅkhātassā’’^eb^tiādi. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena cettha arahattamaggasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Uttamaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇūpanissayabhāvena.

[03]Appehi veyyāvaccakarādīhi attho etissāti ^b^appaṭṭhā^eb^ ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yattha bahū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yatthā^eb^ti yassaṃ paṭipadāyaṃ ^a^M2.0139^ea^. Appo samārambho etassāti ^b^appasamārambho. Pāsaṃsā^eb^ti pasaṃsārahā. ^b^Etaṃ yeva kathāpessāmī^eb^ti eteneva brāhmaṇena kathāpessāmi.

[03]^b^Soppenā^eb^ti niddāya. ^b^Pamādenā^eb^ti jāgariyādīsu ananuyuñjanato sativippavāsalakkhaṇena pamādena. ^b^Paccanīkapaṭiharaṇavasenā^eb^ti paṭipakkhāpanayanavasena. Tathā hi bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā, tesaṃ haraṇato paṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti. ‘‘Paṭī’’ti vā ayaṃ saddo ‘‘pacchā’’ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti ‘‘tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhasmiṃ, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo’’tiādīsu (su. ni. 985; cūḷani. vatthugāthā 4) viya, tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ, attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchāharaṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā, haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti, paṭihāriyameva ^b^pāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^. Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ ^b^pāṭihāriya^eb^nti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato, tattha jātaṃ nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti ^b^pāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Āgatanimittenā^eb^ti āgatākārasallakkhaṇavasena. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Eko rājā^eb^ti dakkhiṇamadhurādhipati ^a^V2.0128^ea^ eko paṇḍurājā. ^b^Evampi te mano^eb^ti iminā ākārena tava mano pavattoti attho. Tena pakārena pavattoti āha ^b^‘‘somanassito vā’’^eb^tiādi. Sāmaññajotanā visese avatiṭṭhatīti adhippāyenevaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Evaṃ tava mano’’ti idañca manaso somanassitatādimattadassanaṃ, na pana yena so somanassito vā domanassito vā, taṃdassanaṃ. Somanassaggahaṇena cettha tadekaṭṭhā rāgādayo saddhādayo ca dassitā honti, domanassaggahaṇena dosādayo. ^b^Dutiya^eb^nti ‘‘itthampi te mano’’ti padaṃ. ^b^Itipī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo nidassanattho ‘‘atthīti ^a^M2.0140^ea^ kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 2.15; 3.90) viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imañca imañca atthaṃ cintayamāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pi^eb^-saddo vuttatthasampiṇḍanattho.
[03]^b^Kathentānaṃ sutvā^eb^ti kathentānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā. ^b^Tassa vasenā^eb^ti tassa vitakkitassa vasena. ^b^Aṭṭakārakenā^eb^ti vinicchayakārakena.

[03]^b^Na ariyāna^eb^nti ariyānaṃ maggaphalacittaṃ na jānātīti attho. Tañhi tena anadhigatattā cetopariyañāṇenapi na sakkā viññātuṃ, aññaṃ pana cittaṃ jānātiyeva. ^b^Heṭṭhimo uparimassa cittaṃ na jānātī^eb^tiādīnipi maggaphalacittameva sandhāya vuttānīti veditabbāni. Sotāpannādayopi hi attanā adhigatameva maggaphalaṃ parehi uppāditaṃ sammā cetopariyañāṇena jānituṃ sakkonti, na attanā anadhigataṃ. Sabbepi ariyā attano phalaṃ samāpajjanti adhigatattāti dassento ^b^‘‘etesu cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yadi ariyā attanā adhigataphalaṃ samāpajjanti, uparimāpi heṭṭhimaṃ phalaṃ samāpajjanti adhigatattā lokiyasamāpattiyo viyāti kassaci āsaṅkā siyā, tannivattanatthamāha ^b^‘‘uparimo heṭṭhimaṃ na samāpajjatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Uparimo^eb^ti sakadāgāmiādiariyapuggalo. ^b^Heṭṭhima^eb^nti sotāpattiphalādiṃ. ^b^Na samāpajjatī^eb^ti satipi adhigatatte na samāpajjati. Kasmāti ce? Kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘tesañhī’’^eb^tiādi, tesaṃ sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phalasamāpatti tesu tesuyeva heṭṭhimesu ariyapuggalesu pavattati, na uparimesūti attho. Iminā heṭṭhimaṃ phalacittaṃ uparimassa na uppajjatīti dasseti. Kasmāti ce? Puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhattā. Etena uparimo ariyo heṭṭhimaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati attanā adhigatattā yathā taṃ lokiyasamāpattinti evaṃ pavatto hetu byabhicāritoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi lokiyajjhānesu puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma atthi visesābhāvato, idha pana asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhanena puthujjanehi ^a^V2.0129^ea^ viya sotāpannassa sotāpannādīhi sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ atthi. Yato heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phaladhammā uparūparimaggadhammehi nivattitā paṭipakkhehi viya abhibhūtā appavattidhammataṃyeva āpannā. Teneva vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭippassaddhattā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Apica ^a^M2.0141^ea^ kusalakiriyappavatti nāma aññā, vipākappavatti ca aññāti anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hoti. Taṃtaṃphalavaseneva hi ariyānaṃ sotāpannādināmalābho. Te sace aññaphalasamaṅginopi honti, sotāpannādināmampi tesaṃ avavatthitaṃ siyā. Tassa tassa vā ariyassa taṃ taṃ phalaṃ sadisanti katvā na uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamaṅgitāya lesopi sambhavati, kuto tassā samāpajjananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Heṭṭhimā ca sotāpannādayo uparimaṃ sakadāgāmiphalādiṃ na samāpajjanti anadhigatattā. Na hi anadhigataṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ sakkā, tasmā sabbepi ariyā attanoyeva phalaṃ samāpajjantīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Pavattentā^eb^ti pavattakā hutvā, pavattanavasenāti attho. ^b^Eva^eb^nti yathānusiṭṭhāya anusāsaniyā vidhivasena paṭisedhavasena ca pavattitākāraparāmasanaṃ. Sā ca sammāvitakkā nāma micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena pavattati. Tattha ānisaṃsassa ādīnavassa ca vibhāvanatthaṃ ^b^aniccasaññameva,^eb^ na niccasaññanti attho. Paṭiyoginivattanatthañhi ^b^eva^eb^-kāraggahaṇaṃ. Idhāpi evasaddaggahaṇassa attho payojanañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^-gahaṇepi eseva nayo. ^b^Pañcakāmaguṇarāga^eb^nti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tadaññarāgassa dosādīnañca pahānassa icchitattā tappahānassa ca tadaññarāgādikhepassa upāyabhāvato. Tathā vuttaṃ duṭṭhalohitavimocanassa pubbaduṭṭhamaṃsakhepanūpāyatā viya. ^b^Lokuttaradhammamevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ paṭikkhepabhāvato sāvajjadhammanivattanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tassa adhigamūpāyānisaṃsabhūtānaṃ tadaññesaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ nānantariyabhāvato.

[03]^b^Cintāmaṇikavijjāsarikkhakata^eb^nti iminā ‘‘cintāmaṇī’’ti evaṃ laddhanāmā loke ekā vijjā atthi, yāya paresaṃ cittaṃ vijānantīti dīpeti. ‘‘Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā yassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo, tassa diṭṭhahatthādivisesasañjānanamukhena cittācāraṃ anuminanto kathetī’’ti keci. Apare ‘‘vācaṃ niccharāpetvā tattha akkharasallakkhaṇavasenā’’ti vadanti.
[03]^b^Idañca^eb^^a^M2.0142^ea^^a^V2.0130^ea^^b^pana sabba^eb^nti ‘‘bhavaṃ gotamo anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhotī’’tiādinayappavattaṃ sabbampi.
[06]Saṅgāravasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Brāhmaṇavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa paṭhame ^b^titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo^eb^ tabbinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhivipphanditassa abhāvato. Ettha hi sattā taranti uppilavanti ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti, tasmā ^b^‘‘tittha’’^eb^nti vuccati. Pāragamanasaṅkhātañhi taraṇaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ natthi, tattheva aparāparaṃ nimujjanummujjanavasena pilavanameva tesaṃ taraṇaṃ nāma. ^b^Uppādakā^eb^ti pūraṇakassapādayo. Titthe jātā ^b^titthiyā,^eb^ yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā, titthikā eva ^b^titthiyā. Manorame^eb^ti sāduphalabharitatāya abhayadisatāya ca manorame. ^b^Imesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti yathāvuttesu titthāyatanesu.

[03]^b^Yo yathā jānāti, tassa tathā vuccatī^eb^ti iminā puggalajjhāsayavasena tathā vuttanti dasseti. ^b^Puggala^eb^-saddo ca tissannampi pakatīnaṃ sādhāraṇo, tasmā purisaggahaṇena tato visesanaṃ yathā ‘‘aṭṭha purisapuggalā’’ti. ^b^Paṭisaṃviditaṃ karotī^eb^ti kevalaṃ jānanavasena viditaṃ karoti. ^b^Anubhavati vā^eb^ti vipākalakkhaṇappattaṃ anubhavati. ^b^Pubbekatahetū^eb^ti antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ padanti āha ^b^‘‘pubbekatakammapaccayenevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetū’’ti iminā vacanena. ^b^Kammavedana^eb^nti kusalākusalakammasahajaṃ vedanaṃ. ^b^Kiriyavedana^eb^nti ‘‘neva kusalākusalā na ca kammavipākā’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ kiriyacittasahajaṃ vedanaṃ. Na kevalañca te kammakiriyavedanā eva paṭikkhipanti, atha kho sāsane loke ca pākaṭe vātābādhādiroge ca paṭikkhipanti evāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ye vā ime’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^pittasamuṭṭhānā^eb^ti pittavikārādhikasambhūtā ^a^V2.0131^ea^. Anantaradvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Sannipātikā^eb^ti pittādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi ^a^M2.0143^ea^ vikārānaṃ sannipātato jātā. ^b^Utupariṇāmajā^eb^ti sītādiutuno vipariṇāmato visamaparivuttito jātā. ^b^Visamaparihārajā^eb^ti asappāyāhārayogapaṭisevanavasena kāyassa visamaṃ pariharaṇato jātā. ^b^Opakkamikā^eb^ti upakkamato nibbattā. ^b^Kammavipākajā^eb^ti kammassa vipākabhūtakkhandhato jātā. Virodhipaccayasamuṭṭhānā dhātūnaṃ vikārāvatthā, tappaccayā vā dukkhā vedanā ābādhanaṭṭhena ^b^ābādho,^eb^ so eva rujjanaṭṭhena ^b^rogo^eb^. Tattha ‘‘yo yāpyalakkhaṇo, so rogo, itaro ābādho’’ti vadanti. Sabbesañca nesaṃ taṃtaṃdhātūnaṃ visamaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ, na tathā itarāni. Tatthāpi ca pakopāvatthā dhātuyo āsannakāraṇaṃ, na tathā parapaccayāvatthāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhamaṃyeva^eb^ kammavipākajaṃ ābādhaṃ ^b^sampaṭicchanti^eb^ ‘‘sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetū’’ti vipallāsaggāhena. ^b^‘‘Pubbe’’^eb^ti purātanasseva kammassa gahitattā upapajjavedanīyampi te paṭikkhipantīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dve paṭibāhitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sampaṭicchantī^eb^ti anujānanti.

[03]^b^Attanā katamūlakenā^eb^ti sāhatthikakammahetu. ^b^Āṇattimūlakenā^eb^ti parassa āṇāpanavasena katakammahetu. ^b^Imā^eb^ti tisso vedanā. ^b^Sabbe paṭibāhantī^eb^ti sabbe roge paṭisedhenti sabbesampi tesaṃ ekena issareneva nimmitattā tabbhāvībhāvāsambhavato. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Sabbaṃ paṭibāhantī^eb^ti hetupaccayapaṭisedhanato sabbaṃ nisedhenti.

[03]^b^Mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā^eb^ti tiṇṇampi vedānaṃ asārabhāvadassanatthaṃ uddesaṃ katvā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ mātikaṃ. ^b^Vibhajitvā dassetu^eb^nti dosadassanavaseneva vibhāgato dassetuṃ. ^b^Laddhipatiṭṭhāpanattha^eb^nti attano laddhiyā paṭijānāpanatthaṃ. ^b^Laddhito laddhiṃ saṅkamantī^eb^ti mūlaladdhito aññaladdhiṃ upagacchanti paṭijānanti. ^b^Pubbekatahetuyeva paṭisaṃvedetī^eb^ti kammavedanampi vipākavedanaṃ katvā vadanti. Diṭṭhigatikā hi byāmūḷhacittā kammantaravipākantarādīni āloḷenti, asaṅkarato saññāpetuṃ na sakkonti. Yathā ca akusalakamme, evaṃ kusalakammepīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ pāṇātipātā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā pubbekatahetu eva pāṇātipātino nāma honti, na idāni sayaṃkatakāraṇā, evaṃ pāṇātipātā viramaṇampi pubbekatahetu evāti vicāriyamāno pubbekatavādo akiriyavādo ^b^eva^eb^ sampajjati.

[03]^b^Kattukamyatāchando^eb^^a^M2.0144^ea^ na taṇhāchando. ^b^Kattukamyatā^eb^ti kātumicchā. ^b^Paccattapurisakāro^eb^ti tena tena purisena kattabbakiccaṃ na hoti pubbekatahetu eva sijjhanato. ^b^Ubhayampi taṃ esa na labbhatī^eb^ti kattabbakaraṇaṃ sucaritapūraṇaṃ, akattabbaakaraṇaṃ duccaritaviratīti idaṃ ubhayampi esa ^a^V2.0132^ea^ na labhati. ^b^Samaṇāpi hi pubbekatakāraṇāyeva hontī^eb^ti pubbekatakāraṇāyeva samaṇāpi honti, na idāni saṃvarasamādānādinā. ^b^Assamaṇāpi pubbekatakāraṇāyevā^eb^ti pubbekatakāraṇāyeva assamaṇāpi honti, na saṃvarabhedena.

[03]Yathā pubbekatavāde chandavāyāmānaṃ asambhavato paccattapurisakārānaṃ abhāvo, evaṃ issaranimmānavādepi issareneva sabbassa nimmitabhāvānujānanatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pubbekatavāde vuttanayeneva veditabbo’’^eb^ti. Esa nayo ahetukavādepīti āha ^b^‘‘tathā ahetukavādepī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Imesa^eb^ntiādinā imesaṃ titthāyatanānaṃ tucchāsāratāya thusakoṭṭanena kuṇḍakamattassapi alābho viya paramatthalesassapi abhāvo, tathā khajjopanakobhāsato tejaso phuliṅgamattassapi abhāvo viya andhaveṇikassapi maggassa appaṭilābho viya saddamattaṃ nissāya micchābhāgena vipallatthatāya ^b^daddarajātake^eb^ (jā. 1.2.43-43) sasakasadisatā ca vibhāvitā hoti. ^b^Sārabhāva^eb^nti sīlasārādisampattiyā sārasabbhāvaṃ. ^b^Niyyānikabhāva^eb^nti ekanteneva vaṭṭato niyyānāvahabhāvaṃ. ^b^Aniggahito^eb^ti na niggahetabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niggahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asaṃkiliṭṭho^eb^ti saṃkilesavirahito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nikkileso’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anupavajjo^eb^ti dhammato na upavaditabbo. ^b^Appaṭikuṭṭho^eb^ nāma appaṭisedhanaṃ vā siyā anakkosanaṃ vāti tadubhayaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘appaṭibāhito anupakkuṭṭho’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Tassa dhammassā^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave’’tiādinā uddhaṭassa dhammassa. ^b^Pañhaṃ pucchitvā^eb^ti kathetukamyatāvasena pañhaṃ pucchitvā. ^b^Yathāpaṭipāṭiyā^eb^ti mātikāya yathānikkhittappaṭipāṭiyā. ^b^Dhātuyo^eb^ti sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātuyo. Tā pana yasmā taṇhādiṭṭhikappanāparikappitaattasubhasukhasassatādipakatiādidhuvādijīvādikāyādikā viya ^a^M2.0145^ea^ na icchāsabhāvā diṭṭhiādirahitehi vimuccamānaudumbarapupphādilokavohāravatthūni viya ca vācāvatthumattā, atha kho saccaparamatthabhūtāti āha ^b^‘‘sabhāvā’’^eb^ti, saccasabhāvāti attho. Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti hi dhātuyo. ^b^Nijjīvanissattabhāvappakāsako^eb^ti bāhiraparikappitajīvābhāvappakāsako lokiyamahājanasaṃkappitasattābhāvappakāsako ca. ^b^Ākaraṭṭhenā^eb^ti uppajjanaṭṭhānabhāvena. Uppattiṭṭhānampi hi ākaro āyatananti vuccati yathā ‘‘kambojo assānaṃ āyatana’’nti. ^b^Manopavicārā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ upecca manaso vividhacaraṇākāro. Kehi katthāti āha ^b^‘‘vitakkavicārapādehī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aṭṭhārasasu ṭhānesū^eb^ti cha somanassaṭṭhāniyāni ^a^V2.0133^ea^, cha domanassaṭṭhāniyāni, cha upekkhāṭṭhāniyānīti evaṃ aṭṭhārasasu ṭhānesu.

[03]^b^Patiṭṭhādhātū^eb^ti sesabhūtattayassa ceva sabbūpādārūpānañca patiṭṭhāsabhāvā dhātu. Iminā nayena ^b^ābandhanadhātū^eb^tiādīsupi attho veditabbo. Apica kakkhaḷabhāvasiddho sahajātadhammānaṃ ādhārabhāvo ^b^patiṭṭhā^eb^bhāvo. Dravabhāvasiddhaṃ sampiṇḍanaṃ ^b^ābandhanaṃ^eb^. Uṇhabhāvasiddhaṃ mudutāpakkatāvahaṃ ^b^paripācanaṃ^eb^. Thaddhabhāvāvahaṃ uddhumātanaṃ ^b^vitthambhanaṃ^eb^. Rūpavivitto rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ so paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhovāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ākāsadhātūti asamphuṭṭhadhātū’’^eb^ti. Sañjānanavidhurā ārammaṇūpaladdhi ^b^vijānanadhātu. Vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati^eb^ saṅkhepantogadhattā vitthārassa. ^b^Saṅkhepato kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati^eb^ kathetabbassa atthassa anavasesapariyādānābhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vitthāratova vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhayathā^eb^ti saṅkhepato vitthārato ca.

[03]Anipphannāpi ākāsadhātu bhūtāni upādāya gahetabbatāmattena ^b^‘‘upādārūpa’’^eb^nteva vuccati. ^b^Diṭṭhānevāti sallakkhetabbāni^eb^ upādārūpabhāvasāmaññato. ^b^Tena sahajātā vedanā vedanākkhandho^eb^ samudāye pavattavohārassa avayavepi dissanato yathā ‘‘vatthekadese daḍḍhe vatthaṃ daḍḍha’’nti. ^b^‘‘Phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ mahābhūmakattā tesaṃ tappadhānattā ca saṅkhārakkhandhassa. ^b^Arūpakkhandhā nāmaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato nāmādhīnaggahaṇato ca. ^b^Rūpakkhandho rūpaṃ^eb^ paribyattaṃ ruppanaṭṭhena. ^b^Paccaya^eb^nti nissayabhūtaṃ paccayaṃ. Vibhāgena ^b^dvācattālīsa. Ekāsīti^eb^^a^M2.0146^ea^^b^cittāni^eb^ ‘‘sammasanacāroya’’nti katvā. ^b^Anukkamena paṭipajjamāno^eb^ti evaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyaṃ ṭhito uparimena tissannaṃ visuddhīnaṃ sampādanavasena visuddhibhāvanaṃ ussukkāpento.

[03]^b^Phassāyatana^eb^nti phassassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Suvaṇṇādīna^eb^nti suvaṇṇamaṇivajirādīnaṃ. Ākiṇṇaṃ viya hutvā uppajjanti etthāti ^b^ākaro^eb^. Yathā cakkhu vipākaphassassa visesapaccayo, na tathā itaresanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dve cakkhuviññāṇānī’’^eb^tiādi. Esa nayo sesavāresupi. Dvattiṃsāya vipākaphassesu dvipañcaviññāṇasahagataphasse ṭhapetvā sesā ^b^dvāvīsati vipākaphassā^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^Diṭṭhameva hoti^eb^ tena samānayogakkhamattā. ^b^‘‘Saṅkhepato tāvā’’^eb^ti saṅkhepakathaṃ ārabhitvāpi vitthārakathāpettha vuttanayattā suviññeyyāvāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā…pe… veditabba’’^eb^nti.

[03]Somanassassa ^a^V2.0134^ea^ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ^b^somanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘somanassassa kāraṇabhūta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Upavicaratī^eb^ti upecca pavattati. Sabhāvato saṅkappato ca somanassādiuppattihetukā somanassaṭṭhāniyāditāti āha ^b^‘‘iṭṭhaṃ vā hotū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Catutthaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti^eb^ tadavinābhāvato.

[03]^b^Ariyasaccānī^eb^ti purimapade uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘ariyabhāvakarānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.531) ^b^pakāsitaṃ,^eb^ tasmā na idha pakāsetabbanti adhippāyo. ^b^Sukhāvabodhanattha^eb^nti desiyamānāya vaṭṭakathāya sukhena avabodhanatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dvādasapada^eb^nti avijjādīhi padehi dvādasapadaṃ. ^b^Paccayavaṭṭa^eb^nti paccayappabandhaṃ. ^b^Kathetukāmo hoti^eb^ paccayākāramukhena saccāni dassetukāmatāya. ^b^Gabbhāvakkantivaṭṭa^eb^nti gabbhokkantimukhena vipākavaṭṭaṃ dasseti ‘‘gabbhassāvakkanti hotī’’tiādinā. Tasmā panettha gabbhāvakkantivaseneva vaṭṭaṃ dassitanti āha ^b^‘‘gabbhāvakkantivaṭṭasmiṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Gabbhāvakkantivaṭṭasmi^eb^nti mātukucchimhi nibbattanavasena pavattadhammappabandhe. ^b^Dassite^eb^ti desanāvasena dassite. Purimā dve yoniyo itarāhi oḷārikatāya ^a^M2.0147^ea^ paribyattatarāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘gabbhāvakkanti…pe… avabodhetumpī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Paccayamatta^eb^nti channaṃ dhātūnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ paccayabhāvamattaṃ, na tehi bhāgaso nipphādiyamānaṃ paccayavisesaṃ ‘‘kuto panetaṃ channaṃ dhātūna’’nti avibhāgena vuttattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na mātu na pitu^eb^ tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ imassa sattassa bāhirabhāvato. ^b^Gabbhassā^eb^ti ettha gabbhati attabhāvabhāvena vattatīti gabbho, kalalādiavattho dhammappabandho. Tannissitattā pana sattasantāno gabbhoti vutto yathā mañcanissitā ‘‘mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī’’ti. Tannissayabhāvato mātukucchi gabbhoti vuccati ‘‘gabbhe vasati māṇavo’’tiādīsu (jā. 1.15.363). Gabbho viyāti vā gabbho. Yathā hi nivāsaṭṭhānatāya sattānaṃ ovarako ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuccati, evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ yāva abhijāti nivāsaṭṭhānatāya mātukucchi ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuccati. Idha pana paṭhamaṃ vuttaattheneva gabbhoti veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gabbho ca nāmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Niratiatthena nirayo ca so yathāvuttena atthena gabbho cāti ^b^nirayagabbho^eb^. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Ayaṃ pana viseso – devamanujādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghā ahutvā tiriyaṃ añcitā dīghāti tiracchānā. Te eva khandhakoṭṭhāsabhāvena yoni ca so vuttanayena gabbho cāti ^a^V2.0135^ea^^b^tiracchānayonigabbho^eb^. Pakaṭṭhato sukhato apetaṃ apagamo petabhāvo, taṃ pattānaṃ visayoti ^b^pettivisayo,^eb^ petayoni. Manassa ussannatāya sūrabhāvādiguṇehi upacitamānasatāya ukkaṭṭhaguṇacittatāya ^b^manussā^eb^. Dibbanti kāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti laḷanti jotantīti ^b^devā. Gabbha^eb^saddo vuttanayo eva. ^b^Nānappakāro^eb^ti yathāvuttena tadanantarabhedena ca nānappakārako. ^b^Manussagabbho adhippeto^eb^ supākaṭatāya paccakkhabhāvato. ^b^Okkanti^eb^ mātukucchiṃ okkamitvā viya uppatitvāti katvā. Nibbattanaṃ ^b^nibbatti. Pātubhāvo^eb^ uppattippakāsako ca.

[03]Sannipāto nāma avekallajātihīnavekalleti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘idha mātāpitaro’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sattaloke. ^b^Sannipatitā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0148^ea^ samodhānabhāvato sannipatitā samāgatā saṃsiliṭṭhā. ^b^Utunī^eb^ti utumatī sañjātapupphā. Idañca utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na lokasamaññākarajassa lagganadivasamattaṃ. Mātugāmassa hi yasmiṃ gabbhāsahasaññite okāse dārako nibbattati, tattha mahatī lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā aggahitapubbā eva bhijjitvā paggharati, vatthu suddhaṃ hoti paggharitalohitattā anāmayattā ca. Visuddhe vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu yāva satta divasāni khettameva hoti. Suddhaṃ vatthu nahānato parampi katipayāni divasāni gabbhasaṇṭhahanatāya khettameva hoti parittassa lohitalesassa vijjamānattā. Tasmiṃ samaye hatthaggāhaveṇiggāhādinā aṅgaparāmasanenapi dārako nibbattatiyeva. Itthisantānepi hi sattapi dhātū labbhanteva. Tathā hi ^b^pārikāya nābhiparāmasanena^eb^ sāmassa bodhisattassa, ^b^diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena^eb^ (jā. aṭṭha. 4.15.mātaṅgajātakavaṇṇanā; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.65) maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi. Gandhanato uppannagatiyā nimittūpaṭṭhānena sūcanato dīpanato gandhoti laddhanāmena bhavagāmikammunā abbati pavattatīti ^b^gandhabbo,^eb^ tattha uppajjamānakasatto. ^b^Paccupaṭṭhito hotī^eb^ti na mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito paccupaṭṭhito nāma hoti, kammayantayantito pana eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Tadā hi tatrūpagasatto tatrūpapattiāvahantakammasaṅkhātena pellakayantena tathatthāya pellito upanīto viya hoti.

[03]^b^Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa^eb^nti ettha viññāṇassa paccayabhāvena gahitattā ^b^‘‘tayo arūpino khandhā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idha pana viññāṇaṃ paccayabhāvena aggahetvā gabbhokkantiyā eva paccayabhāvena gahitattā ^b^‘‘viññāṇakkhandhampi pakkhipitvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idha pana manussagabbhassa okkantiyā adhippetattā ^b^‘‘gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Taṇhāya ^a^V2.0136^ea^ samudayasaccabhāvena gahitattā ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā taṇha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tasseva pabhāvikā^eb^ti tasseva yathāvuttassa dukkhasaccassa uppādikā. ^b^Dukkhanirodho^eb^ti ^a^M2.0149^ea^ ettha dukkhaggahaṇena taṇhāpi gahitāti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ dvinnampi…pe… dukkhanirodho’’^eb^ti. Avisesena hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ idha dukkhanti adhippetaṃ. Atha vā dukkhassa anuppattinirodho tabbhāvikāya taṇhāya anuppattinirodhena vinā na hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tesaṃ dvinnampi…pe… dukkhanirodho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anuppattinirodho^eb^ti ca anuppattinirodhanimittaṃ nibbānaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^‘‘Tattha vuttanayeneva veditabba’’^eb^nti vatvā ubhayattha pāḷiyā pavattiākārabhedaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ pana viseso’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti visaddhimagge. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte. ^b^Avijjāya tvevā^eb^ti avijjāya tu eva. ^b^Asesavirāganirodhā^eb^ti ettha accantameva saṅkhāre virajjati etenāti virāgo, maggo, tasmā virāgasaṅkhātena maggena asesanirodhā asesetvā nirodhā samucchindanāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Sakalassā^eb^ti anavasesassa. ^b^Kevalassā^eb^ti vā suddhassa, paraparikappitasattajīvādivirahitassāti attho. ^b^Khīṇākāropi vuccati^eb^ ‘‘nirujjhanaṃ nirodho’’ti iminā atthena. ^b^Arahattampi nirodhoti vuccati^eb^ nirodhante uppannattā. ^b^Nibbānampi nirodhoti vuccati^eb^ avijjādīnaṃ nirodhassa nimittabhāvato avijjādayo nirujjhanti etthāti nirodhoti katvā. ^b^Khīṇākāradassanavasenā^eb^ti avijjādīnaṃ anuppattinirodhena nirujjhanākāradassanavasena. ^b^Nibbānameva sandhāya,^eb^ na pana arahattanti adhippāyo. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ niggaho nāma yathāvuttadhammaparicchedato ūnādhikabhāvappakāsanena attasabhāvavibhāvaneneva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘niggaṇhanto hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Titthāyatanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^parittātuṃ samatthabhāvenā^eb^ti uppannabhayato rakkhituṃ samatthabhāvena. Natthi ettha mātāputtaṃ aññamaññaṃ tāyituṃ samatthanti amātāputtāni, tāniyeva ^b^amātāputtikāni^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘natthi etthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ya^eb^nti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘yasmiṃ samaye’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mātāpi puttaṃ passituṃ na labhati,^eb^ parittātuṃ na samatthanti adhippāyo ^a^M2.0150^ea^. ^b^Puttopi mātara^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. Cittutrāsoyeva bhayaṃ ^b^cittutrāsabhayaṃ^eb^. Iminā ottappabhayādiṃ nivatteti. Aṭaviggahaṇena aṭavivāsino ^a^V2.0137^ea^ vuttā ‘‘sabbo gāmo āgato’’tiādīsu viyāti āha ^b^‘‘aṭavīti cettha aṭavivāsino corā veditabbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ete^eb^ti aṭavivāsino corā. ^b^Etaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘aṭavisaṅkopo’’ti idaṃ vuttaṃ. Ṭhānagamanādiiriyāpathacakkasamaṅgino iriyāpathacakkasamāruḷhā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘iriyāpathacakkampi vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. Iriyāpathoyeva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti ^b^iriyāpathacakkaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Pariyāyantī^eb^ti parito tena tena disābhāgena gacchanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ito cito ca gacchantī’’^eb^ti. Mātupemena gantuṃ avisahitvā attano santikaṃ ^b^āgacchantaṃ^eb^. Attasinehassa balavabhāvato mātarampi anapekkhitvā ‘‘attānaṃyeva rakkhissāmī’’ti ^b^gacchantaṃ. Ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīna^eb^nti vuttanayeneva gantvā ekasmiṃ kheme padese nisinnaṃ. ^b^Kulle vā^eb^tiādīsu kūlaṃ paratīraṃ vahati pāpetīhi ^b^kullo,^eb^ taraṇatthāya veḷunaḷādīhi kalāpaṃ katvā baddho. Pattharitvā baddho pana ^b^uḷumpo,^eb^ cāṭiādi ^b^mattikābhājanaṃ. Vuyhamāna^eb^nti udakoghena adhosotaṃ nīyamānaṃ.
[03]Yathāvuttāni tīṇi bhayāni samātāputtikāniyeva assutavato puthujjanassa vasena amātāputtikāni dassitānīti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ pariyāyato amātāputtikāni bhayāni dassetvā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Bhayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^evaṃnāmake janapade^eb^ti yattha nāmaggahaṇena kosalasaddassa ruḷhīsaddataṃ dasseti. Tathā hi kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena ‘‘kosalā’’ti vuccati. Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni (pāṇini 1.2.51) icchanti. Ayamettha ruḷhī yathā aññatthāpi ‘‘kurūsu viharati, aṅgesu viharatī’’ti ca. Tabbisesane pana janapadasadde jātisadde ekavacanameva ^a^M2.0151^ea^ yathā ‘‘kosalesu janapade’’ti. ^b^Cārika^eb^nti caraṇaṃ. Caraṇaṃ vā cāro, so eva ^b^cārikā^eb^. Tayidaṃ maggagamanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, na cuṇṇikagamanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘addhānagamanaṃ gacchanto’’^eb^ti. Taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cārikā ca nāmesā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^dūrepī^eb^ti dūrepi nātidūrepi. ^b^Sahasā gamana^eb^nti sīghagamanaṃ. ^b^Mahākassapapaccuggamanādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āḷavakādīnaṃ atthāya gamanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Bhagavā hi mahākassapattheraṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutamaggamagamāsi. Āḷavakassatthāya ^a^V2.0138^ea^ tiṃsayojanaṃ, tathā aṅgulimālassa, pukkusātissa pana pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ, mahākappinassa vīsayojanasataṃ, dhaniyassatthāya satta yojanasatāni, dhammasenāpatino saddhivihārikassa vanavāsissa tissasāmaṇerassa tigāvutādhikaṃ vīsayojanasataṃ agamāsi. ^b^Imaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti imaṃ aturitacārikaṃ sandhāya.

[03]^b^Upalabhiṃsū^eb^ti ettha savanavasena upalabhiṃsūti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sotadvāra…pe… jāniṃsū’’^eb^ti āha. Sabbampi vākyaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā antogadhāvadhāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘padapūraṇamatte vā nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avadhāraṇatthenā^eb^ti pana iminā iṭṭhatthatovadhāraṇatthaṃ kho-saddaggahaṇanti dasseti. ^b^Assosī^eb^ti padaṃ kho-sadde gahite tena phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti, tena ca purimapacchimapadāni saṃsiliṭṭhāni nāma honti, na tasmiṃ aggahiteti āha ^b^‘‘padapūraṇena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Matta^eb^saddo visesanivattiattho. Tenassa anatthantaradīpanatā dassitā hoti, ^b^eva^eb^saddena pana byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya ekantikatā.

[03]^b^Samitapāpattā^eb^ti accantaṃ anavasesato savāsanaṃ samitapāpattā. Evañhi bāhirakavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamanato bhagavato pāpasamanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Tenassa yathābhūtaguṇādhigatametaṃ nāmaṃ yadidaṃ samaṇoti dīpeti. Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ idha anussavattho adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘khalūti anussavatthe nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ālapanamatta^eb^nti piyālāpavacanamattaṃ. Piyasamudāhārā hete ‘‘bho’’ti vā ‘‘āvuso’’ti vā ‘‘devānaṃ piyā’’ti vā. ^b^Gottavasenā^eb^ti ettha gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. Gotamoti hi pavattamānaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena ^a^M2.0152^ea^ vinā na vattati, tathā abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. Ko pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca ^b^samaṇo^eb^ti iminā parikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatākittanato. ^b^Gotamo^eb^ti iminā lokiyajanehi uccākulasambhūtatā dīpitā tena uditoditavipulakhattiyakulavibhāvanato. Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ.

[03]^b^Kenaci pārijuññenā^eb^ti ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenacipi pārijuññena parihāniyā ^b^anabhibhūto^eb^ anajjhotthaṭo. Tathā hi tassa kulassa na kiñci pārijuññaṃ lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ, atha kho vaḍḍhiyeva. Abhinikkhamane ca tatopi samiddhatamabhāvo loke ^a^V2.0139^ea^ pākaṭo paññātoti. ^b^Sakyakulā pabbajito^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato saddhāpabbajitabhāvadīpanaṃ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitabhāvasiddhito.

[03]^b^Itthambhūtākhyānatthe^eb^ti itthaṃ evaṃpakāro bhūto jātoti evaṃ kathanatthe. ^b^Upayogavacana^eb^nti ‘‘abbhuggato’’ti ettha abhi-saddo itthambhūtākhyānatthajotako, tena yogato ‘‘taṃ kho pana bhavanta’’nti idaṃ sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato^eb^ti kalyāṇehi guṇehi yutto, tannissito tabbisayatāyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Seṭṭho^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kittetabbato kitti, sā eva saddanīyato saddoti āha ^b^‘‘kittisaddoti kittiyevā’’^eb^ti. Abhitthavanavasena pavatto saddo ^b^thutighoso. Sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā uggato^eb^ti anaññasādhāraṇe guṇe ārabbha pavattattā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā uggato.

[03]^b^So bhagavā^eb^ti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho devānaṃ atidevo ^a^M2.0153^ea^ sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi sadevake loke ‘‘bhagavā’’ti patthaṭakittisaddo, so bhagavā. ‘‘Bhagavā’’ti ca idaṃ satthu nāmakittanaṃ. Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati ‘‘bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata’’ntiādi (mahāni. 84). Parato pana ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti guṇakittanaṃ. Yathā kammaṭṭhānikena ‘‘araha’’ntiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ ^b^iti^eb^-saddaṃ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussariyanti, evaṃ buddhaguṇasaṃkittanenapīti dassento ^b^‘‘itipi arahaṃ itipi sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi bhagavā’’^eb^ti āha. ‘‘Itipetaṃ bhūtaṃ itipetaṃ taccha’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.6) viya idha ^b^iti^eb^saddo āsannapaccakkhakaraṇattho, ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena ca tesaṃ guṇānaṃ bahubhāvo dīpito, tāni ca saṃkittentena viññunā cittassa sammukhībhūtāneva katvā saṃkittetabbānīti dassento ^b^‘‘iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti āha. Evaṃ nirūpetvā kittento yo kitteti, tassa bhagavati ativiya abhippasādo hoti.

[03]^b^Ārakattā^eb^ti suvidūrattā. ^b^Arīna^eb^nti kilesārīnaṃ. ^b^Arāna^eb^nti saṃsāracakkassa arānaṃ. ^b^Hatattā^eb^ti viddhaṃsitattā. ^b^Paccayādīna^eb^nti cīvarādipaccayānañceva pūjāvisesānañca. ^b^Tato^eb^ti visuddhimaggato (visuddhi. 1.125-127). Yathā ca visuddhimaggato, evaṃ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanātopi nesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Imaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0140^ea^^b^loka^eb^nti nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sadevaka’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idāni vattabbaṃ nidassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pajātattā^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ kammakilesehi nibbattattā. ^b^Pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ^eb^ pārisesanayena itaresaṃ padantarena gahitattā. ^b^Sadevaka^eb^nti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho. ^b^Chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ^eb^ paccāsattinayena. Tattha hi so jāto tannivāsī ca. ^b^Sabrahmakavacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇa^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Paccatthikasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇa^eb^nti nidassanamattametaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ samitabāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇavacanena gahitattā. Kāmaṃ ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā ^a^M2.0154^ea^ tesaṃ, ‘‘salomako sapakkhako’’tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa’’^eb^nti.

[03]Arūpino sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā dibbantīti devāti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti āha ^b^‘‘sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaraloko gahito’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ‘‘ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyata’’nti (a. ni. 3.117). ^b^Samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko gahito^eb^ tassa savisesaṃ mārassa vase vattanato. ^b^Sabrahmakaggahaṇena rūpībrahmaloko gahito^eb^ arūpībrahmalokassa gahitattā. ^b^Catuparisavasenā^eb^ti khattiyādicatuparisavasena. Itarā pana catasso parisā samārakādiggahaṇena gahitā evāti. ^b^Avasesasattaloko^eb^ nāgagaruḷādibhedo. ^b^Tīhākārehī^eb^ti devamārabrahmasahitatāsaṅkhātehi tīhi pakārehi. ^b^Tīsu padesū^eb^ti ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādīsu tīsu padesu. ^b^Tena tenākārenā^eb^ti sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena. ^b^Tedhātukameva pariyādinna^eb^nti porāṇā āhūti yojanā.

[03]^b^Abhiññā^eb^ti yakāralopenāyaṃ niddeso, abhijānitvāti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘abhiññāya adhikena ñāṇena ñatvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anumānādipaṭikkhepo^eb^ti anumānaatthāpattiādippaṭikkhepo ekappamāṇattā. Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.

[03]^b^Anuttaraṃ vivekasukha^eb^nti phalasamāpattisukhaṃ. Tena vimissāpi kadāci bhagavato dhammadesanā hotīti ^b^‘‘hitvāpī’’^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddaggahaṇaṃ. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti, yathāsutaṃ vā dhammaṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ khaṇaṃ pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya ^a^V2.0141^ea^ dhammaṃ deseti. ^b^Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento^eb^ti ugghaṭitaññussa vasena appaṃ vā, vipañcitaññussa neyyassa vā vasena bahuṃ vā desento. Dhammassa kalyāṇatā ca niyyānikatā ca sabbaso anavajjabhāvenevāti āha ^b^‘‘anavajjameva katvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Desakāyattena ^a^M2.0155^ea^ āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanāti sā pariyattidhammavasena veditabbāti āha ^b^‘‘desanāya tāva cātuppadikagāthāyapī’’^eb^tiādi. Nidānanigamānipi satthu desanāya anuvidhānato tadantogadhāni evāti āha ^b^‘‘nidānaṃ ādi, idamavocāti pariyosāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]Sāsitabbapuggalagatena yathāparādhādisāsitabbabhāvena anusāsanaṃ tadaṅgavinayādivasena vinayanaṃ sāsananti taṃ paṭipattidhammavasena veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘sīlasamādhivipassanā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kusalāna^eb^nti anavajjadhammānaṃ sīlasamathavipassanānaṃ sīladiṭṭhīnañca ādibhāvo taṃmūlikattā uttarimanussadhammānaṃ. Ariyamaggassa antadvayavigamena majjhimāpaṭipadābhāvo viya sammāpaṭipattiyā ārabbha nibbattīnaṃ vemajjhatāpi majjhabhāvoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atthi, bhikkhave…pe… majjhimaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Phalaṃ pariyosānaṃ nāma^eb^ saupādisesatāvasena. ^b^Nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ nāma^eb^ anupādisesatāvasena. Idāni tesaṃ dvinnampi sāsanassa pariyosānataṃ āgamena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmātiha tva’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Sātthaṃ sabyañjana’’ntiādivacanato dhammadesanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘idha…pe… adhippeta’’^eb^nti. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe kathāvadhisaddappabandho gāthāvasena suttavasena ca vavatthito pariyattidhammo, so idha desanāti vutto, tassa pana attho visesato sīlādi evāti āha ^b^‘‘bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento…pe… dassetī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^sīlaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti sīlaggahaṇena sasambhāraṃ sīlaṃ gahitaṃ, tathā maggaggahaṇena sasambhāro maggoti tadubhayavasena anavasesato pariyattiatthaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti sīlādidassanena. Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo adhippeto. ^b^Kathikasaṇṭhitī^eb^ti kathikassa saṇṭhānaṃ kathanavasena samavaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Na so sātthaṃ deseti^eb^ niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya. ^b^Ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā^eb^ti sithilādibhedesu byañjanesu ekappakāreneva dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttā damiḷabhāsā viya. Vivaṭakaraṇatāya oṭṭhe aphusāpetvā uccāretabbato ^b^sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā^eb^ kirātabhāsā viya. Sabbasseva vissajjanīyayuttatāya ^b^sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā^eb^^a^M2.0156^ea^^b^vā^eb^ yavanabhāsā viya. Sabbasseva sānusāratāya ^a^V2.0142^ea^^b^sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā^eb^ pārasikādimilakkhabhāsā viya. Sabbāpesā byañjanekadesavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti katvā ^b^‘‘abyañjanā’’^eb^ti vuttā.

[03]Ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyanti evamādi ^b^sithilaṃ^eb^. Tāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ vaggesu dutiyacatutthanti evamādi ^b^dhanitaṃ^eb^. Dvimattakālaṃ ^b^dīghaṃ^eb^. Ekamattakālaṃ ^b^rassaṃ^eb^. Tadeva lahukaṃ ^b^lahukameva^eb^. Saṃyogaparaṃ dīghañca ^b^garukaṃ^eb^. Ṭhānakaraṇāni niggahetvā uccāretabbaṃ ^b^niggahitaṃ^eb^. Parena sambandhaṃ katvā uccāretabbaṃ ^b^sambandhaṃ^eb^. Tathā na sambandhaṃ ^b^vavatthitaṃ^eb^. Ṭhānakaraṇāni vissaṭṭhāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ ^b^vimuttaṃ. Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo^eb^ti evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhiyā akkharuppādakacittassa dasappakārena pabhedo. Sabbāni hi akkharāni cittasamuṭṭhānāni yathādhippetatthabyañjanato byañjanāni ca.

[03]^b^Amakkhetvā^eb^ti amilecchetvā, avināsetvā, ahāpetvāti attho. Bhagavā yamatthaṃ ñāpetuṃ ekagāthaṃ ekavākyampi deseti, tamatthaṃ tāya desanāya parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya eva desetīti āha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ desetī’’^eb^ti. Idha ^b^kevala^eb^saddo anavasesavācako, na avomissatādivācakoti āha ^b^‘‘sakalādhivacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paripuṇṇa^eb^nti sabbaso puṇṇaṃ. Taṃ pana kiñci ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā na hotīti ^b^‘‘anūnādhikavacana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tattha yadatthaṃ desitaṃ, tassa sādhakattā anūnatā veditabbā, tabbidhurassa pana asādhakattā anadhikatā. ^b^Sakala^eb^nti sabbabhāgavantaṃ. ^b^Paripuṇṇamevā^eb^ti sabbaso paripuṇṇameva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekadesanāpi aparipuṇṇā natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aparisuddhā desanā nāma hoti^eb^ taṇhāsaṃkilesattā. Lokāmisaṃ cīvarādayo paccayā, tattha agadhitacittatāya ^b^lokāmisanirapekkho. Hitapharaṇenā^eb^ti hitūpasaṃharaṇena. ^b^Mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo^eb^ti mettābhāvanāya karuṇāya vā muduhadayo. ^b^Ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitenā^eb^ti sakalasaṃkilesato vaṭṭadukkhato ca uddharaṇākārāvaṭṭhitena cittena, karuṇādhippāyenāti attho. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ^a^M2.0157^ea^ sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ idha brahmacariyanti adhippetaṃ, tasmā. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti iminā samānādhikaraṇāni sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Sundara^eb^nti bhaddakaṃ. Bhaddakatā ca passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvena veditabbāti āha ^b^‘‘atthāvahaṃ sukhāvaha’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^atthāvaha^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthasaṃhitahitāvahaṃ. ^b^Sukhāvaha^eb^nti yathāvuttatividhasukhāvahaṃ. ^b^Tathānurūpāna^eb^nti tādisānaṃ. Yādisehi pana guṇehi bhagavā ^a^V2.0143^ea^ samannāgato, tehi catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbathāpi accantappasādanīyo tesaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvattāti dassento ^b^‘‘yathārūpo’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^yathābhūta…pe… arahata^eb^nti iminā dhammappamāṇalūkhappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahatā dassitā, itarena itaresaṃ. ^b^Dassanamattampi sādhu hotī^eb^ti ettha kosiyavatthu kathetabbaṃ. ^b^Ubhatopakkhikā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhivasena ubhayapakkhikā. ^b^Kerāṭikā^eb^ti saṭhā.

[03]Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ ^b^yāvañcida^eb^nti nipātasamudāyo adhimattappamāṇaparicchedaṃ dīpetīti āha ^b^‘‘adhimattappamāṇaparicchedavacanameta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Adhimattavippasannānī^eb^ti adhikappamāṇena vippasannāni. ^b^Vippasannānī^eb^ti ca pakatiākāraṃ atikkamitvā vippasannānīti attho. Nanu ca cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ manoviññeyyattā kathaṃ tena tesaṃ vippasannatā viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘tassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti brāhmaṇassa. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ. Evampi manindriyena patiṭṭhitokāsassa adiṭṭhattā kathaṃ manindriyassa vippasannatā tena viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Nayaggāhapaññā hesā tassa brāhmaṇassa. ^b^Mane vippasanneyeva hoti^eb^ pasannacittasamuṭṭhitarūpasampadāhi eva cakkhādīnaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsassa pasannatāsambhavato.

[03]Jambonadasuvaṇṇaṃ rattavaṇṇameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘surattavaṇṇassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jambonadasuvaṇṇassa ghaṭikā^eb^ti jambonadasuvaṇṇapiṇḍaṃ. Iminā ^b^nekkha^eb^nti nekkhappamāṇajambonadasuvaṇṇena kataṃ akatabhaṇḍaṃ vuttanti dasseti. ^b^Nekkha^eb^nti vā atirekapañcasuvaṇṇena katapilandhanaṃ katabhaṇḍaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañhi ghaṭṭanamajjanakkhamaṃ hotīti. ^b^Suvaṇṇa^eb^nti ca pañcadharaṇassa ^a^M2.0158^ea^ samaññā, tasmā pañcavīsatidharaṇahiraññavicitaṃ ābharaṇaṃ idha nekkhanti adhippetaṃ. ^b^Jambonada^eb^nti mahājambusākhāya pavattanadiyaṃ nibbattaṃ. Taṃ kira ratanaṃ rattaṃ. Suvaṇṇākāre mahājambuphalarase vā pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭhe suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti, tena suvaṇṇena katapilandhanantipi attho. ^b^Suparikammakata^eb^nti suṭṭhu kataparikammaṃ. ^b^Sampahaṭṭha^eb^nti sammā pahaṭṭhaṃ ghaṭṭanādivasena sukataparikammaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suvaṇṇakāra…pe… suparimajjitanti attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vāḷarūpānī^eb^ti āharimāni vāḷarūpāni. ‘‘Akappiyarūpākulo akappiyamañco pallaṅkoti sārasamāse. ^b^Ratanacitra^eb^nti bhitticchedādivasena ratanacitraṃ. Rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakitūlānaṃ vasena ^b^tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ^eb^. Uddalomiyaṃ ^b^kecī^eb^ti sārasamāsācariyā uttaravihārino ca. Tathā ekantalomiyaṃ. ^b^Koseyyakaṭṭissamaya^eb^nti koseyyakasaṭamayaṃ. ^b^Ajinacammehī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0144^ea^ ajinamigacammehi. Tāni kira cammāni sukhumatarāni. Tasmā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni katvā sibbanti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ajinappaveṇī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Nikāmalābhī^eb^ti yathicchitalābhī. Tenāha ^b^‘‘icchiticchitalābhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vipulalābhī^eb^ti uḷāralābhī. Kasiranti hi parittaṃ vuccati, tappaṭikkhepena ^b^akasiraṃ^eb^ uḷāraṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahantalābhī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Laddhā ca na kappantī^eb^ti sāmaññena paṭisiddhattā sabbathā na kappatīti kassaci āsaṅkā siyā, tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘kiñci kiñci kappatī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^suddhakoseyya^eb^nti ratanaparisibbanarahitaṃ. Ettha ca ‘‘suddhakoseyyaṃ pana vaṭṭatī’’ti ^b^vinaye^eb^ (mahāva. aṭṭha. 254) vuttattā idhāpi ettakameva vuttaṃ. ^b^Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.15) ^b^pana^eb^ ‘‘ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘‘ṭhapetvā tūlika’’nti etena ratanasibbanarahitāpī tūlikā na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. ^b^Vacanato^eb^ti etena ^b^vinaye^eb^ (cūḷava. 297) vuttabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Ekena vidhānenā^eb^ti yathāvuttameva vidhānaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavatā ‘‘laddhā ca na kappantī’’ti sāmaññena paṭisedho katoti āha ^b^‘‘akappiyaṃ pana upādāyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Pallaṅka^eb^nti ettha ^b^pari^eb^-saddo samantatoti etasmiṃ atthe vattati, tasmā vāmūruṃ dakkhiṇūruñca samaṃ ṭhapetvā ubho pāde aññamaññasambandhe katvā ^a^M2.0159^ea^ nisajjā pallaṅkanti āha ^b^‘‘samantato ūrubaddhāsana’’^eb^nti. Ūrūnaṃ bandhanavasena nisajjā. ^b^Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā^eb^ti ca yathā pallaṅkavasena nisajjā hoti, evaṃ ubho pāde ābhuje samiñjite katvāti attho. Taṃ pana ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ tathā sambandhatākaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘bandhitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā^eb^ti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā. Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na uppajjanti. Tāsu anuppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuddhiṃ phātiṃ gacchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ujuṃ kāyaṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti uparimaṃ kāyaṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Heṭṭhimakāyassa hi anujukaṭṭhapanaṃ nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti. ^b^Ujuṃ kāya^eb^nti ettha ^b^kāya^eb^-saddo uparimakāyavisayo.

[03]^b^Parimukha^eb^nti ^a^V2.0145^ea^ ettha ^b^pari^eb^-saddo abhisaddena samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānābhimukha’’^eb^nti, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho. Ettha yathā ‘‘vanantaññeva pavisāmī’’tiādinā bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ ‘‘nisīdāmī’’ti iminā alīnānuddhaccapakkhiyo santo iriyāpatho dassito, ‘‘pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā’’ti iminā nisajjāya daḷhabhāvo, ‘‘parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā’’ti iminā ārammaṇapariggahūpāyo. ^b^Pariggahitaniyyāna^eb^nti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramasatinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^Parīti pariggahaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘pariṇāyikā’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 16.20) viya. ^b^Mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘suññatavimokkha’’ntiādīsu (paṭi. ma. 1.209-210) viya. Paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho hi niyyānaṭṭho.

[03]Cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni dibbabhāvāvahattā dibbavihārā nāma hontīti tadāsannappavattacaṅkamopi tadupacārato dibbo nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘cattāri hi rūpajjhānānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Samāpajjitvā caṅkamantassā^eb^ti idañca caṅkamantassa antarantarā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya caṅkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā avuṭṭhitena sakkā caṅkamituṃ. ^b^Samāpattito vuṭṭhāya caṅkamantassapi caṅkamoti^eb^ idaṃ pana samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā antarantarā samāpajjitvā caṅkamantassa vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Dvīsu^eb^^b^vihāresū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0160^ea^ brahmavihāre, ariyavihāre ca.
