Aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute sumbhakapattadhare gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ^a^V2.0185^ea^ piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā sayampi tādisena ākārena ^a^M2.0204^ea^ tathāpaṭipajjanato ‘‘ahaṃ brahmacārī’’ti paṭiññaṃ dento viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘brahmacāripaṭiññoti brahmacāripaṭirūpako’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ahampi bhikkhū’’ti vatvā uposathaṅgādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño hotiyeva, tathā saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhanto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ vā…pe… evaṃpaṭiñño’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akkosatī^eb^ti ‘‘assamaṇosi, samaṇapaṭiññosī’’tiādinā akkosati. ^b^Paribhāsatī^eb^ti ‘‘so tvaṃ ‘hotu, muṇḍakasamaṇo aha’nti maññasi, idāni te assamaṇabhāvaṃ āropessāmī’’tiādinā vadanto paribhāsati.

[03]Kilesakāmopi assādiyamāno vatthukāmantogadhoyeva, kilesakāmavasena ca tesaṃ assādanaṃ siyāti āha ^b^‘‘kilesakāmena vatthukāme sevantassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kilesakāmenā^eb^ti karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Natthi doso^eb^ti assādetvā visayaparibhoge natthi ādīnavo, tappaccayā na koci antarāyoti adhippāyo. ^b^Pātabbataṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti paribhuñjanakataṃ upagacchati. Paribhogattho hi ayaṃ pā-saddo, kattusādhano ca tabba-saddo, yathāruci paribhuñjatīti attho. ^b^Pivitabbataṃ paribhuñjitabbata^eb^nti etthāpi kattuvaseneva attho veditabbo.
[06]Āpāyikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^115^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye parena katassa upakārassa anurūpappavatti attani kataṃ upakāraṃ upakārato jānanto vediyanto ^b^kataññū katavedī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘iminā mayhaṃ kata’’^eb^ntiādi.
[06]Dullabhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^116^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^sukhena metabbo^eb^ti yathā parittassa udakassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati, evameva ‘‘uddhato’’tiādinā yathāvuttehi aguṇaṅgehi ^a^M2.0205^ea^ samannāgatassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhatīti, sukhena metabbo. ^b^Dukkhena metabbo^eb^ti yathā mahāsamuddassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati, evameva ‘‘anuddhato’’tiādinā dassitehi guṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati, ‘‘anāgāmī ^a^V2.0186^ea^ nu kho khīṇāsavo nu kho’’ti vattabbataṃ gacchati, tenesa dukkhena metabbo. ^b^Pametuṃ na sakkotī^eb^ti yathā ākāsassa na sakkā pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ, evaṃ khīṇāsavassa, tenesa pametuṃ na sakkāti ^b^appameyyo^eb^.

[03]Sārābhāvena tucchattā naḷo viya naḷo, mānoti āha ^b^‘‘unnaḷoti uggatanaḷo’’^eb^ti, uṭṭhitatucchamānoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitoti attho’’^eb^ti. Mano hi seyyassa seyyoti sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato tuccho. ^b^Cāpallenā^eb^ti capalabhāvena, taṇhāloluppenāti attho. ^b^Mukharo^eb^ti mukhena pharuso, pharusavācoti attho. ^b^Vikiṇṇavāco^eb^ti visaṭavacano samphappalāpitāya apariyantavacano. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asaññatavacano’’^eb^ti, divasampi niratthakavacanaṃ palāpīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Cittekaggatārahito^eb^ti upacārappanāsamādhirahito caṇḍasote baddhanāvā viya anavaṭṭhitakiriyo. ^b^Bhantacitto^eb^ti anavaṭṭhitacitto paṇṇāruḷhavālamigasadiso. ^b^Vivaṭindriyo^eb^ti saṃvarābhāvena gihikāle viya asaṃvutacakkhādiindriyo.
[06]Appameyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^117^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe saha byayati gacchatīti sahabyo, sahapavattanako. Tassa bhāvo ^b^sahabyatā,^eb^ sahapavattīti āha ^b^‘‘sahabhāvaṃ upapajjatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Yāvatakaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ khepetvā nirayampi gacchatī’’tiādivacanato arūpabhavato cutassa apāyūpapatti vuttā viya dissatīti tannivattanatthaṃ bhagavato adhippāyaṃ vivaranto ‘‘sandhāyabhāsitamidaṃ vacana’’nti dīpeti ^b^‘‘nirayādīhi avippamuttattā’’^eb^tiādinā. Na hi tassa upacārajjhānato balavataraṃ akusalaṃ atthīti. Iminā tato cavantānaṃ upacārajjhānameva paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammanti dīpeti. Adhikaṃ ^a^M2.0206^ea^ payasati payujjati etenāti ^b^adhippayāso,^eb^ savisesaṃ itikattabbakiriyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adhikappayogo’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Āneñjasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^118^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V2.0187^ea^^b^dinna^eb^nti deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadatī’’^eb^ti. Dinnaṃ pana annādivatthuṃ kathaṃ paṭikkhipati. Esa nayo ^b^‘‘yiṭṭhaṃ huta’’^eb^nti etthāpi. ^b^Mahāyāgo^eb^ti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānaṃ. ^b^Paheṇakasakkāro^eb^ti pāhunakānaṃ kātabbasakkāro. ^b^Phala^eb^nti ānisaṃsaphalaṃ nissandaphalañca. ^b^Vipāko^eb^ti sadisaphalaṃ. ^b^Paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthī^eb^ti paraloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo ayaṃ loko na hoti. ^b^Idhaloke ṭhitassapi paraloko natthī^eb^ti idhaloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo paraloko na hoti. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantī’’^eb^ti. Ime sattā yattha yattha bhavayonigatiādīsu ṭhitā, tattha tattheva ucchijjanti, dvayavināsena vinassanti.

[03]^b^Phalābhāvavasenā^eb^ti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalassa abhāvavasena ‘‘natthi mātā, natthi pitā’’ti vadati, na mātāpitūnaṃ, nāpi tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ abhāvavasena tesaṃ lokapaccakkhattā. Pubbuḷakassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalo, na ca khanapubbakoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘natthi sattā opapātikā’’^eb^ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘cavitvā uppajjanakā sattā nāma natthīti vadatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī^eb^ti ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya sayaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā pavedenti, te natthīti sabbaññubuddhānaṃ abhāvaṃ dīpeti.
[06]Vipattisampadāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^119-120^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M2.0207^ea^^b^chahi talehi samannāgato pāsako^eb^ti catūsu passesu cattāri talāni, dvīsu koṭīsu dve talānīti evaṃ chahi talehi samannāgato pāsakakīḷāpasutānaṃ maṇisadiso pāsakaviseso. Sattamaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Apaṇṇakasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^121^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0188^ea^^b^sucibhāvo^eb^ti kilesāsucivigamena suddhabhāvo asaṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo, atthato kāyasucaritādīni.
[06]Paṭhamasoceyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^122^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame samucchedavasena pahīnasabbakāyaduccaritatāya kāye, kāyena vā suci ^b^kāyasuci^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāyadvāre’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Soceyyasampanna^eb^nti paṭippassaddhakilesattā parisuddhāya soceyyasampattiyā upetaṃ. Ninhātā aggamaggasalilena vikkhālitā pāpā etenāti ^b^ninhātapāpako,^eb^ khīṇāsavo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khīṇāsavova kathito’’^eb^ti.
[06]Dutiyasoceyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^123^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame munino bhāvā ^b^moneyyāni,^eb^ yehi dhammehi ubhayahitamunanato muni nāma hoti, te munibhāvakarā moneyyā paṭipadā dhammā eva vuttā. Munino vā etāni ^b^moneyyāni,^eb^ yathāvuttadhammā eva. Tattha yasmā kāyena akattabbassa akaraṇaṃ, kattabbassa ca karaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0208^ea^, ‘‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.377; ma. ni. 1.110; saṃ. ni. 4.127; khu. pā. 3.dvattiṃsākāra) kāyasaṅkhātassa ārammaṇassa jānanaṃ, kāyassa ca samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato ca yāthāvato parijānanatā, tathā parijānanavasena pana pavatto vipassanāmaggo, tena ca kāye chandarāgassa pajahanaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāraṃ nirodhetvā pattabbasamāpatti vā, sabbe ete kāyamukhena pavattā moneyyappaṭipadā dhammā ^b^kāyamoneyyaṃ nāma^eb^. Tasmā tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘katamaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ? Tividhakāyaduccaritassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, tividhakāyasucaritampi kāyamoneyya’’ntiādinā (mahāni. 14) pāḷi āgatā. Idhāpi teneva pāḷinayena atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tividhakāyaduccaritappahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Idāni ^a^V2.0189^ea^ ‘‘katamaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ? Catubbidhavacīduccaritassa pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ, vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ, vācāpariññā, pariññāsahagato maggo, vācāya chandarāgassa pahānaṃ, vacīsaṅkhāranirodho dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyya’’nti imāya pāḷiyā vuttamatthaṃ atidīpento ^b^‘‘vacīmoneyyepi eseva nayo’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha copanavācañceva saddavācañca ārabbha pavattā paññā ^b^vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ^eb^. Tassā vācāya samudayādito parijānanaṃ ^b^vācāpariññā^eb^.

[03]‘‘Katamaṃ manomoneyyaṃ? Tividhamanoduccaritassa pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ manosuccaritaṃ, manārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ, manapariññā, pariññāsahagato maggo, manasmiṃ chandarāgassa pahānaṃ, cittasaṅkhāranirodho saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyya’’nti imāya pāḷiyā āgatanayena atthaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘manomoneyyepi imināva nayena atthaṃ ñatvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ca ekāsītividhaṃ lokiyacittaṃ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṃ^b^ manārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ.^eb^ Tassa samudayādito parijānanaṃ ^b^manapariññā^eb^ti ayaṃ viseso.
[06]Moneyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Āpāyikavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^124-125^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa ^a^M2.0209^ea^ paṭhame ^b^taṇhāgedhena gathito^eb^ti taṇhābandhanena baddho. ^b^Taṇhāmucchanāyā^eb^ti taṇhāya vasena mucchāpattiyā. ^b^Mucchito^eb^ti mucchaṃ mohaṃ pamādaṃ āpanno. ^b^Ajjhopanno^eb^ti adhiopanno. Taṇhāya adhibhavitvā ajjhotthaṭo gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā viya ṭhito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ajjhopannoti taṇhāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā pavatto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anādīnavadassāvī^eb^ti gathitādibhāvena paribhoge ādīnavamattampi na passati. ^b^Nissaraṇapañño^eb^ti ayamattho āhāraparibhogeti tattha payojanaparicchedikā ‘‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; 2.24; 3.75; saṃ. ni. 4.120; a. ni. 6.58; 8.9) pavattā ^a^V2.0190^ea^ āhārapaṭibaddhachandarāganissaraṇabhūtā paññā assa atthīti nissaraṇapañño. Sesamettha uttānameva. Dutiye natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Kusinārasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^126^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^sambahulā^eb^ti pañcasatamattā. Pañcasatā kira brāhmaṇā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū aparabhāge bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ passamānā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā na cirasseva sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā pariyattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādesuṃ – ‘‘yaṃ yaṃ bhagavā katheti, taṃ taṃ mayaṃ khippameva jānāma. Bhagavā hi itthiliṅgādīni tīṇi liṅgāni, nāmādīni cattāri padāni, paṭhamādayo satta vibhattiyo muñcitvā na kiñci katheti, evaṃ kathite ca amhākaṃ gaṇṭhipadaṃ nāma natthī’’ti, te bhagavati agāravā hutvā tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato upaṭṭhānampi dhammassavanampi abhiṇhaṃ na gacchanti. Te sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sambahulā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā…pe… dhammassavanaṃ na gacchantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mukhapaṭiññaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave’’tiādinā tamatthaṃ paṭipucchitvā ‘‘saccaṃ bhagavā’’ti tehi bhikkhūhi vuttaṃ paṭivacanaṃ gahetvā. Tañhi attano mukheneva paṭiññātattā ‘‘mukhapaṭiññā’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Neva^eb^^a^M2.0210^ea^^b^āgataṭṭhānaṃ na gataṭṭhānaṃ addasaṃsu^eb^. Kasmā? Aññāṇato. Te kira tassa suttassa atthaṃ na jāniṃsu. Tesañhi tasmiṃ samaye vicitranayaṃ desanāvilāsayuttampi taṃ suttaṃ ghanaputhulena dussapaṭṭena mukhaṃ baddhaṃ katvā purato ṭhapitamanuññabhojanaṃ viya ahosi. Nanu ca bhagavā attanā desitaṃ dhammaṃ pare ñāpetuṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto, so kasmā yathā te na jānanti, tathā desetīti? Tesaṃ mānabhañjanatthaṃ. Bhagavā hi ‘‘abhabbā ime imaṃ mānakhilaṃ anupahacca maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā sacchikātu’’nti tesaṃ sutapariyattiṃ nissāya uppannaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desanākusalo mānabhañjanatthaṃ ‘‘sabbadhammamūlapariyāya’’ntiādinā ^b^mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.1) abhāsi.

[03]^b^Sammāsambuddho^eb^^a^V2.0191^ea^^b^‘‘mayhaṃ kathā niyyātī’’ti mukhasampattameva kathetīti cintayiṃsū^eb^ti idaṃ aṅguttarabhāṇakānaṃ vaḷañjanakatantinīhārena vuttaṃ. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana evaṃ vadanti – evaṃ mānabhañjanatthaṃ desitañca pana taṃ suttaṃ sutvā te bhikkhū ‘‘taṃyeva kira pathaviṃ diṭṭhigatiko sañjānāti, sekhopi arahāpi tathāgatopi abhijānāti, ki nāmidaṃ kathaṃ nāmida’’nti cintentā ‘‘pubbe mayaṃ bhagavatā kathitaṃ yaṃkiñci khippameva jānāma, idāni panimassa mūlapariyāyassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā na jānāma na passāma, aho buddhā nāma appameyyā atulā’’ti uddhatadāṭhā viya sappā nimmadā hutvā buddhūpaṭṭhānañca dhammassavanañca sakkaccaṃ agamaṃsu. Tena samayena dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū ‘‘aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo, te nāmabrāhmaṇapabbajitā tathā mānamadamattā bhagavatā mūlapariyāyadesanāya nihatamānā katā’’ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā bhagavā ‘‘na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ahaṃ evaṃ ime mānapaggahitasīse carante nihatamāne akāsi’’nti vatvā atītaṃ āharanto ‘‘bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, aññataro disāpāmokkho brāhmaṇo bārāṇasiyaṃ paṭivasati tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇṭukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo, so pañcamattāni māṇavakasatāni mante vāceti. Paṇḍitamāṇavakā bahuñca gaṇhanti lahuñca, suṭṭhu ca upadhārentī’’tiādinā jātakaṃ kathesi.

[03]Taṃ ^a^M2.0211^ea^ sutvā te bhikkhū ‘‘pubbepi mayaṃ māneneva upahatā’’ti bhiyyosomattāya nihatamānā hutvā attano upakārakammaṭṭhānaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ. Tato bhagavā ekaṃ samayaṃ janapadacārikaṃ caranto vesāliṃ patvā gotamake cetiye viharanto imesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ viditvā idaṃ gotamakasuttaṃ kathesi. Idañca suttaṃ sutvā te pañcasatā bhikkhū tasmiṃyeva āsane saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.

[03]^b^Abhiññāyā^eb^ti kusalādibhedaṃ khandhādibhedañca desetabbaṃ dhammaṃ, veneyyānañca āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādibhedaṃ, tassa ca nesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ yāthāvato abhijānitvāti attho. ^b^Ime pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanānī^eb^tiādi panettha nidassanamattaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sappaccaya^eb^nti sakāraṇaṃ, veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayena vā pucchāya vā aṭṭhuppattiyā vā sanimittaṃ hetūdāharaṇasahitañcāti attho. Rāgādīnaṃ paṭiharaṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva pāṭihāriyaṃ, saha pāṭihāriyenāti ^b^sappāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^. Rāgādippaṭisedhanavaseneva hi satthā dhammaṃ deseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena sappāṭihāriyameva katvā’’^eb^ti. Apare pana ‘‘yathārahaṃ iddhiādesanānusāsanipāṭihāriyasahita’’nti ^a^V2.0192^ea^ vadanti anusāsanipāṭihāriyarahitā desanā natthīti katvā. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Gotamakacetiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^127^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^āḷārakālāmakāle^eb^ti āḷārakālāmānaṃ dharamānakāle. ^b^Pariñña^eb^nti pahānapariññaṃ. Sā hi samatikkamo, na itarā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pariññā nāma samatikkamo’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca paṭhamo satthā rūpāvacarasamāpattilābhī daṭṭhabbo, dutiyo arūpāvacarasamāpattilābhī, tatiyo sammāsambuddho daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^puggalapaññattiyaṃ^eb^ (pu. pa. 130) –

[08]‘‘Yvāyaṃ ^a^M2.0212^ea^ satthā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, na rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, na vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā lābhī satthā tena daṭṭhabbo. Yvāyaṃ satthā kāmānañca pariññaṃ paññāpeti, rūpānañca pariññaṃ paññāpeti, na vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, arūpāvacarasamāpattiyā lābhī satthā tena daṭṭhabbo. Yvāyaṃ satthā kāmānañca pariññaṃ paññāpeti, rūpānañca pariññaṃ paññāpeti, vedanānañca pariññaṃ paññāpeti, sammāsambuddho satthā tena daṭṭhabbo’’ti.

[03]Tattha titthiyā samayaṃ jānantā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeyyuṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ vadamānā. Rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeyyuṃ arūparāgaṃ vadamānā. Vedanāpariññaṃ paññāpeyyuṃ asaññārāgaṃ vadamānā. Te pana ‘‘idaṃ nāma paṭhamajjhānaṃ, ayaṃ rūpabhavo, ayaṃ asaññābhavo’’tipi na jānanti. Te paññāpetuṃ asakkontāpi kevalaṃ ‘‘paññāpemā’’ti vadanti. Tathāgato pana kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ anāgāmimaggena paññāpeti, rūpavedanānaṃ arahattamaggena. Evamettha dve janā bāhirakā, eko sammāsambuddhoti imasmiṃ loke tayo satthāro nāma.
[06]Bharaṇḍukālāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^128^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V2.0193^ea^^b^abhikkantā^eb^ti atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘khaye dissatī’’^eb^ti. Teneva hi ^b^‘‘nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo’’^eb^ti anantaraṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhikkantataro^eb^ti ativiya kantataro. Tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sundare dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ko^eb^ti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko katamo? ^b^Me^eb^ti mama. ^b^Pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^Iddhiyā^eb^ti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. ^b^Yasasā^eb^ti iminā edisena parivārena paricchedena. ^b^Jala^eb^nti vijjotamāno. ^b^Abhikkantenā^eb^ti ativiya kantena kamanīyena abhirūpena. ^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. ^b^Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā^eb^ti dasa disā pabhāsento, cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho. ^b^Abhirūpe^eb^ti uḷārarūpe sampannarūpe. ^b^Abbhanumodane^eb^ti sampahaṃsane ^a^M2.0213^ea^. ^b^Idha panā^eb^ti ‘‘abhikkantāya rattiyā’’ti etasmiṃ pade. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti sundarapariyāyattā. Khaye vā idha abhikkantasaddo daṭṭhabbo, tena ‘‘abhikkantāya parikkhīṇāya rattiyā’’ti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Rūpāyatanādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^saddena akkharādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo^eb^ti suvaṇṇacchavīti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘chaviya’’^eb^nti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘kañcanasannibhattaco’’ti (ma. ni. 2.399; su. ni. 556). ^b^Saññūḷhā^eb^ti sambandhitā, ganthitāti attho. ^b^Vaṇṇā^eb^ti guṇavaṇṇāti āha ^b^‘‘thutiya’’^eb^nti, thomanāyanti attho. ^b^Kulavagge^eb^ti khattiyādikulakoṭṭhāse. Tattha ‘‘accho vippasanno’’tiādinā vaṇṇitabbaṭṭhena ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ chavi. Vaṇṇanaṭṭhena abhitthavaṭṭhena ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ thuti. Aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato vaṇṇetabbato ṭhapetabbato ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ khattiyādikulavaggo. Vaṇṇīyati ñāpīyati etenāti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ ñāpakakāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇanato thūlarassādibhāvena upaṭṭhānato ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ saṇṭhānaṃ. Mahantaṃ khuddakaṃ majjhimanti vaṇṇetabbato pamitabbato ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati cakkhunā passīyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ rūpāyatananti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe vaṇṇasaddassa pavatti veditabbā. ^b^So^eb^ti vaṇṇasaddo. ^b^Chaviyā daṭṭhabbo^eb^ rūpāyatane gayhamānassapi chavimukheneva gahetabbato. Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇo’’ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.

[03]^b^Kevalaparipuṇṇa^eb^nti ekadesampi asesetvā niravasesatova paripuṇṇanti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘anavasesatā attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kevalakappā^eb^ti ^b^kappa^eb^-saddo nipāto padapūraṇamattaṃ, ‘‘kevalaṃ’’icceva attho. Kevalasaddo ca bahulavācīti āha ^b^‘‘yebhuyyatā attho’’^eb^ti. Keci pana ^a^V2.0194^ea^ ‘‘īsakaṃ asamattaṃ kevalaṃ kevalakappa’’nti vadanti. Anavasesattho ettha kevalasaddo siyā, anatthantarena pana kappasaddena padavaḍḍhanaṃ kataṃ ‘‘kevalā eva kevalakappā’’ti. Tathā vā kappanīyattā paññapetabbattā kevalakappā. ^b^Abyāmissatā^eb^ vijātiyena asaṅkaro suddhatā. ^b^Anatirekatā^eb^ taṃparamatā visesābhāvo. ^b^Kevalakappa^eb^nti kevalaṃ ^a^M2.0214^ea^ daḷhaṃ katvāti attho. Kevalaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavivittattā, taṃ etassa adhigataṃ atthīti ^b^kevalī,^eb^ sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo.

[03]^b^Kappa^eb^-saddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ okappasaddamattaṃ nidasseti, aññathā kappasaddassa atthuddhāre okappaniyapadaṃ anidassanameva siyā. ^b^Samaṇakappehī^eb^ti vinayasiddhehi samaṇavohārehi. ^b^Niccakappa^eb^nti niccakālaṃ. ^b^Paññattī^eb^ti nāmaṃ. Nāmañhetaṃ tassa āyasmato, yadidaṃ kappoti. ^b^Kappitakesamassū^eb^ti kattariyā cheditakesamassu. ^b^Dvaṅgulakappo^eb^ti majjhanhikavelāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgulatāvikappo. ^b^Leso^eb^ti apadeso. Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassa obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā, ayaṃ pana sabbasseva pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappasaddo gahitoti āha ^b^‘‘anavasesaṃ samantato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ābhāya pharitvā^eb^ti vatthamālālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitāya ābhāya pharitvā. Devatānañhi sarīrobhāsaṃ dvādasayojanamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Tato bhiyyopi pharitvā tiṭṭhati, tathā vatthābharaṇādisamuṭṭhitā pabhā.
[06]Hatthakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^129^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe gāvīnaṃ kayavikkayavasena yogo etthāti goyogo, kayavikkayaṃ karonto gāvīhi yujjanti etthāti vā goyogo, gāvīnaṃ vikkayaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha jāto pilakkharukkho ^b^goyogapilakkho,^eb^ tasmiṃ. Samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gāvīnaṃ vikkayaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitapilakkhassa santike’’^eb^ti. Ritto assādo etassāti ^b^rittassādo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jhānasukhābhāvena rittassāda’’^eb^nti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Kaṭuviyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^131^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0215^ea^^a^V2.0195^ea^^b^idaṃ te mānasmi^eb^nti ettha ^b^mānasmi^eb^nti paccatte bhummavacanaṃ. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ca liṅgavipallāsena napuṃsakaniddeso katoti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamāno’’^eb^ti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
[06]Dutiyaanuruddhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^132^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^asādhāraṇasikkhāpada^eb^nti bhikkhunīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃyeva paññattasikkhāpadaṃ ^b^sādhāraṇasikkhāpada^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca sādhāraṇaṃ ubhatopaññattisikkhāpadaṃ.
[06]Paṭicchannasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^133^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^thiraṭṭhānato^eb^ti thiraṭṭhānatova. Pāsāṇe lekhasadisā parāparādhanibbattā kodhalekhā yassa so pāsāṇalekhūpamasamannāgato ^b^pāsāṇalekhūpamo^eb^ti vutto. Evaṃ itarepi. ^b^Anusetī^eb^ti appahīnatāya anuseti. ^b^Na khippaṃ lujjatī^eb^ti na antarā nassati kammaṭṭhāneneva nassanato. ^b^Evameva^eb^nti evaṃ tassapi puggalassa kodho na antarā punadivase vā aparadivase vā niṭṭhāti, addhaniyo pana hoti, maraṇeneva niṭṭhātīti attho. ^b^Kakkhaḷenā^eb^ti atikakkhaḷena dhammacchedakena thaddhavacanena. ^b^Saṃsandatī^eb^ti ekībhavati. ^b^Sammodatī^eb^ti nirantaro hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Atha vā ^b^sandhiyatī^eb^ti ṭhānagamanādīsu kāyakiriyāsu kāyena samodhānaṃ gacchati, tilataṇḍulā viya missībhāvaṃ upetīti attho. ^b^Saṃsandatī^eb^ti cittakiriyāsu cittena samodhānaṃ gacchati, khīrodakaṃ viya ekībhāvaṃ upetīti attho. ^b^Sammodatī^eb^ti uddesaparipucchādīsu vacīkiriyāsu ^a^M2.0216^ea^ vācāya samodhānaṃ gacchati, vippavāsāgatopi piyasahāyako viya piyatarabhāvaṃ upetīti ^a^V2.0196^ea^ attho. Apica kiccakaraṇīyesu tehi saddhiṃ ādītova ekakiriyābhāvaṃ upagacchanto ^b^sandhiyati,^eb^ yāva majjhā pavattanto ^b^saṃsandati,^eb^ yāva pariyosānā anivattanto ^b^sammodatī^eb^ti veditabbo.
[06]Lekhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Kusināravaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^134^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthassa paṭhame yujjhanaṃ yodho, so ājīvo etassāti ^b^yodhājīvo^eb^. Yuddhamupajīvatīti vā etasmiṃ atthe ^b^yodhājīvo^eb^ti niruttinayena padasiddhi veditabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yuddhaṃ upajīvatīti yodhājīvo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saha…pe… passatī^eb^ti pubbabhāge vipassanāpaññāya sammasanavasena, maggakkhaṇe abhisamayavasena attapaccakkhena ñāṇena passati.
[06]Yodhājīvasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^appaṭipucchitvā vinītā^eb^ti ‘‘taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā’’tiādinā appaṭipucchitvā kevalaṃ dhammadesanāvaseneva vinītaparisā. ^b^Dubbinītaparisā^eb^ti dukkhena vinītaparisā. ^b^Pucchitvā vinītā^eb^ti ‘‘taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave’’tiādinā pucchitvā anumatiggahaṇavasena vinītā. ^b^Suvinītaparisā^eb^ti sukhena vinītaparisā. Anumatiggahaṇavasena vinayanañhi na dukkaraṃ hoti.
[06]Parisāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^137^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^M2.0217^ea^^a^V2.0197^ea^^b^uppādā vā tathāgatāna^eb^nti tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi veneyyapuggalānaṃ maggaphaluppatti viya saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādisabhāvo na tathāgatuppādāyatto, atha kho tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi anuppādepi hotimevāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Ṭhitāva sā dhātū^eb^ti ṭhito eva so aniccasabhāvo byabhicārābhāvato na kadāci saṅkhārā aniccā na hoti. Kāmaṃ asaṅkhatā viya dhātu na nicco so sabhāvo, tathāpi sabbakālikoyevāti adhippāyo.

[03]Aparo nayo – ^b^ṭhitāva sā dhātū^eb^ti ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’’ti esā dhātu esa sabhāvo tathāgatānaṃ uppādato pubbe uddhañca appaṭivijjhiyamāno na tathāgatehi uppādito, atha kho sabbakālaṃ sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, ṭhitāva sā dhātu, kevalaṃ pana sayambhuñāṇena abhisambujjhanato ‘‘ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena abhisambuddho’’ti pavedanato ca tathāgato dhammassāmīti vuccati apubbassa tassa uppādanato. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ṭhitāva sā dhātū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Abhisambujjhatī^eb^ti ñāṇena abhisambujjhati. ^b^Abhisametī^eb^ti ñāṇena abhisamāgacchati. ^b^Ācikkhatī^eb^ti katheti. ^b^Desetī^eb^ti dasseti. ^b^Paññāpetī^eb^ti jānāpeti. ^b^Paṭṭhapetī^eb^ti ñāṇamukhe ṭhapeti. ^b^Vivaratī^eb^ti vivaritvā dasseti. ^b^Vibhajatī^eb^ti vibhāgato dasseti. ^b^Uttānīkarotī^eb^ti pākaṭaṃ karoti.

[03]Atha vā ^b^abhisambujjhatī^eb^ti paccakkhakaraṇena abhimukhaṃ bujjhati, yāthāvato paṭivijjhati. Tato eva ^b^abhisameti^eb^ abhimukhaṃ samāgacchati. Ādito kathento ^b^ācikkhati,^eb^ uddisatīti attho. Tameva uddesaṃ pariyosāpento ^b^deseti^eb^. Yathāuddiṭṭhamatthaṃ nidassanavasena pakārehi ñāpento ^b^paññāpeti^eb^. Pakārehi etamatthaṃ patiṭṭhapento ^b^paṭṭhapeti^eb^. Yathāuddiṭṭhaṃ paṭinidassanavasena ^b^vivarati vibhajati^eb^. Vivaṭaṃ vibhattañca atthaṃ hetūdāharaṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto ^b^uttānīkaroti^eb^.
[06]Uppādāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^138-143^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^M2.0218^ea^^a^V2.0198^ea^^b^tantāvutānaṃ vatthāna^eb^nti idaṃ ‘‘yāni kānicī’’ti iminā samānādhikaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘paccatte sāmivacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vāyitāna^eb^nti vītānaṃ. ^b^Lāmako^eb^ti nihīno, ^b^makkhali moghapuriso^eb^ti ettha ^b^makkhalī^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. Taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, ‘‘tāta, mā khalī’’ti sāmiko āha. So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho. Sāmiko upadhāvitvā naṃ dussakaṇṇe aggahesi, sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi. So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi. Manussā taṃ disvā ‘‘ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho, natthi iminā sadiso’’ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti. So ‘‘mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna’’nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi, tadeva ca pabbajjaṃ aggahesi. Tassa santike aññepi aññepīti pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu. Taṃ sandhāyāha ‘‘makkhali moghapuriso’’ti. Chaṭṭhādīni uttānatthāni eva.
[06]Kesakambalasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^144-146^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame akuppadhammatāya khayavayasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ atītāti accantā, evaṃ aparihāyanasabhāvattā accantā niṭṭhā assāti ^b^accantaniṭṭho^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antaṃ atikkantaniṭṭho’’^eb^tiādi. Na hi paṭividdhassa lokuttaradhammassa dassanaṃ kuppanaṃ nāma atthi. ^b^Dhuvaniṭṭho^eb^ti satataniṭṭho. Accantameva catūhi yogehi khemo etassa atthīti ^b^accantayogakkhemī,^eb^ niccayogakkhemīti attho. Maggabrahmacariyassa vusitattā tassa avihāyanasabhāvattā accantaṃ brahmacārīti ^b^accantabrahmacārī,^eb^ niccabrahmacārīti attho. ^b^Pariyosāna^eb^nti brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapariyosānañca ^a^M2.0219^ea^. Accantaṃ pariyosānamassāti ^b^accantapariyosāno^eb^. Dvādasamaterasamāni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Paṭhamamoranivāpasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Yodhājīvavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^147-156^eb^^b^.^eb^ Maṅgalavaggo ^a^V2.0199^ea^ uttānatthoyeva.
[06]Tatiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^157-163^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ito paresu pana suttapadesu ^b^‘‘gāḷhā’’^eb^ti vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘kakkhaḷā’’^eb^ti āha. Kakkhaḷacāro cassā na lūkhasabhāvo. Atha kho taṇhāvasena thiraggahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘lobhavasena thiraggahaṇā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Agāḷhā paṭipadā^eb^ti vā kāmānaṃ ogāhanaṃ paṭipatti, kāmasukhānuyogoti attho. ^b^Nijjhāmā paṭipadā^eb^ti kāyassa nijjhāpanavasena khepanavasena pavattā paṭipatti, attakilamathānuyogoti attho. ^b^Niccelo^eb^ti nissaṭṭhacelo sabbena sabbaṃ paṭikkhittacelo. Naggiyavatasamādānena ^b^naggo. Ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karotī^eb^tiādi nidassanamattaṃ vamitvā mukhavikkhālanādiācārassapi tena vissaṭṭhattā. ^b^Jivhāya hatthaṃ apalekhati^eb^ avalekhati udakena adhovanato. Dutiyavikappepi eseva nayo. ‘‘Ehi, bhadante’’ti vutte upagamanasaṅkhāto vidhi ehibhadanto, taṃ caratīti ehibhadantiko, tappaṭikkhepena ^b^na ehibhadantiko. Na karoti^eb^ ‘‘samaṇena nāma parassa vacanakarena na bhavitabba’’nti adhippāyena.

[03]^b^Puretara^eb^nti taṃ ṭhānaṃ attano upagamanato puretaraṃ. Taṃ kira so ‘‘bhikkhunā nāma yadicchakā eva bhikkhā gahetabbā’’ti adhippāyena na gaṇhāti. ^b^Uddissa kataṃ^eb^ mama nimittabhāvena bahū khuddakā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpāditāti na gaṇhāti. ^b^Nimantanaṃ na sādiyati^eb^ evaṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatīti. Kumbhi ādīsupi so sattasaññīti āha ^b^‘‘kumbhi-kaḷopiyo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kabaḷantarāyo hotī^eb^ti uṭṭhitassa dvinnampi kabaḷantarāyo hoti. Gāmasabhāgādivasena saṅgamma kittenti etissāti ^b^saṅkitti,^eb^ yathāsaṃhatataṇḍulādisañcayo. ^b^Mānusakānī^eb^ti veyyāvaccakarā manussā.

[03]^b^Surāpānamevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0220^ea^^a^V2.0200^ea^ majjalakkhaṇappattāya surāya pānameva. Surāgahaṇenevettha merayampi saṅgahitaṃ. Ekāgārameva uñchatīti ^b^ekāgāriko^eb^. Ekālopeneva vattatīti ^b^ekālopiko^eb^. Dīyati etāyāti ^b^datti,^eb^ dvattiālopamattaggāhi khuddakaṃ bhikkhādānabhājanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khuddakapātī’’^eb^ti. Abhuñjanavasena eko aho etassa atthīti ekāhiko, āhāro, taṃ ^b^ekāhikaṃ^eb^. So pana atthato ekadivasaṃ laṅghako hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ekādivasantarika’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dvāhika^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ekāhaṃ abhuñjitvā ekāhaṃ bhuñjanaṃ ^b^ekāhavāro,^eb^ taṃ ekāhikameva atthato. Dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā dvīhaṃ bhuñjanaṃ ^b^dvīhavāro^eb^. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Ukkaṭṭho pana pariyāyabhattabhojaniko dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā ekāhameva bhuñjati. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03]Micchāvāyāmavaseneva ukkuṭikavatānuyogoti āha ^b^‘‘ukkuṭikavīriyamanuyutto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Attakilamathānuyoga^eb^nti attano kilamathānuyogaṃ, sarīradukkhakāraṇanti attho. Sarīrapariyāyo hi idha attasaddo ‘‘attantapo’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.413) viya. ^b^Dve ante^eb^ti ubho koṭiyo, ubho lāmakapaṭipattiyoti attho. Lāmakampi hi antoti vuccati ‘‘antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ (saṃ. ni. 3.80; itivu. 61), koṭṭhako anto’’ti evamādīsu. Majjhimapaṭipadāya uppathabhāvena amanīyā gantabbā ñātabbāti ^b^antā^eb^. Tato eva lāmakā.
[06]Acelakavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^164-184^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samanuñño^eb^ti sammadeva katānuñño. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samānajjhāsayo’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Iti manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Tikanipātavaṇṇanāya anuttānatthadīpanā samattā.
